loans.name: Tu

texts.en:
Tu, 39, is married and has two children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband is a driver for hire.

Tu has been running a business of sewing and processing garments for 16 years. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying materials and tools to increase her making of garments.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions and sending her children to school.

loans.use: To buy materials and tools to make garments.

loans.name: Uyen

texts.en:
Uyen is 38 years old and married, with three sons. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. 

She and her husband earns an income running a shop repairing vehicles and selling spare parts. 

She started this business 18 years ago. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of spare parts to meet her customers' demand.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy spare parts and equipment for her shop.

loans.name: Chin

texts.en:
Chin is 57 years old and married, with three children. Her husband is a worker at an insurance company. They live in Ho Chi Minh City.

She has been running a general store in front of her door for two years. She started this business to cover her expenses and raise her children. 

Chin is requesting a loan to expand her business by offering more food and many kinds of soft drinks.  She hopes that she will be able to increase the turnover of her business. 

She hopes that through the loan she will be able to expand her business activities and have money to reinvest in her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy food and soft drinks to sell at her store.

loans.name: Osam Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are members of the Osam Group. They are small-scale businesswomen based in Lunsar, a town in northern Sierra Leone. Together, they are applying for a loan of 5,400,000 Sierra Leonean Leones (SLL) in order to enable them to further expand their respective businesses. Consequently, they will make more profits and improve their standards of living. 

The featured leader of this group is Fatmata. She is 35 years old and was born in northern Sierra Leone. She is married and has three children. Her husband is a businessman and her children are attending primary and secondary schools.  For the past 15 years, Fatmata has been selling grocery store goods like milk, sugar, soft drinks, butter, biscuits, etc.  With this loan, she will expand her business by buying the previously mentioned items in larger quantities to add to her current stock for sale.

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, soft drinks, butter, biscuits, etc. in larger quantities to add to her current stock of grocery store goods for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cellphone accessories and credit, thus improving his overall sales.

loans.name: Maria  Eva

texts.es: La señora Maria Eva se dedica a su actividad  de venta de comida en un mercado, la señora tiene experiencia de 41 años ya que este negocio era familiar y ella desde muy temprana edad empezó como ayudante de su mamá. desde hace 20 años decidió independizarse poner su propio negocio con ahorro, la señora Eva tiene cuatro hijos de estos solo uno esta en edad escolar el cual depende de ella, trabaja de lunes a domingo desde las seis de la mañana a cuatro de la tarde, solicita financiamiento para invertirlo en su negocio y tener mercadería en existencia ya que ella manifiesta que si compra al por mayor le es mas favorable para ella.
texts.en:
Maria Eva sells food in a market.  She has 41 years of experience as this was a family business and she started helping her mother at a very early age. Twenty years ago she decided to become independent and start her own business with savings.  Eva has four children and only one is school-age and is dependent on her.  She works from Monday to Sunday from six in the morning until four in the afternoon.

She is asking for a loan to invest in her business so she can have merchandise in stock. It is better for her if she can buy at wholesale.

loans.use: to buy quintals of rice, sugar, and beans, drums of oil - ingredients.

loans.name: Rano

texts.ru: Рано является повторной клиенткой ИМОН. Она честная женщина и вовремя погашает займ. Рано в 1988 года окончила университет по специальности биолога. Она уже 24 года работает в средней школе учителем биологии. Рано очень любит свою профессию и преподает с удовольствием. Она кормилица 4 детей. Ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации. Рано должна провести свадебное торжество ее дочери, но не имеет достаточно денег, так как у нее маленькая зарплата. Она должна еще дать приданное для своей дочери. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 7500 сомони для проведения свадебного торжества своей дочери. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Rano is a returning customer of IMON. She is an honest woman and makes her loan payments on time. In 1988, Rano finished university with a specialization in biology. She has been working for 24 years already in a high school as a biology teacher. Rano loves her profession very much and teaches with great pleasure. She is the breadwinner for four children. Her husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation.

Rano needs to put on a wedding celebration for her daugher, but she does not have enough money since she has a small salary. She must also give a dowry for her daughter.

She is requesting a loan of 7,500 somoni for putting on her daughter's wedding celebration.

loans.use: to put on a wedding party for her daughter

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more lotions to sell.

loans.name: Manzura

texts.ru: Манзура родилась в 1983 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. Манзура всегда мечтала стать учительницей. Однако трудное условие жизни и недостаток финансов стали преградой для того, чтобы поступить в университет. Манзура нашла работу и постепенно накопила денег. Три года назад она поступила в Таджикский Педагогический Университет Таджикистана. Она является студенткой 3 курса по специальности преподаватель истории и права. Она в этом году не в состоянии оплатить за учебный договор. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора.  Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Manzura was born in 1983. She is married and is raising one small child. Manzura always dreamed of becoming a teacher. However, difficult living conditions and lack of finances became a barrier to going to university. Manzura began work and gradually saved money.

Three years ago, she enrolled in Tajik Pedagogical University of Tajikistan. She is a third year student with a specialization as a teacher of history and law.

This year, she is not in a position to pay for tuition. She is requesting a loan to pay tuition.

loans.use: to pay for education

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, juice, soft drinks, etc., for her business

loans.name: Luz Victoria

texts.es: La señora Luz Victoria tiene un taller de tortilleria desde hace 12 años en el barrio el Rosario, trabaja de lunes a domingo desde las cuatro de la mañana empieza a mandar a moler el maiz para luego ponerse a palmear tortillas y mandarlas  a vender con dos jovenes que salen a vender a las calles, la señora Victoria es una mujer luchadora, es madre de dos hijos, solo uno en edad escolar el otro niño no tiene la edad para asistir a la escuela, solicita el financiamiento para comprar maiz al por mayor y aprovechar la venta de buñuelos ya que en el mes de noviembre es buena esta venta y comprar yuca al por mayor.
texts.en: Luz Victoria has had a business making tortillas in the Rosario barrio for 12 years.  She works seven days a week from 4am, when she sends out the corn to be ground before preparing the tortillas.  After making them, she has two young employees who go out to sell the tortillas in the streets.  Victoria is a very plucky woman and is a mother to two children, one of whom is of school age, the other younger.  Victoria is applying for a loan to buy maize and yucca in bulk and to sell fritters, which always sell well in November.

loans.use: to buy hundredweights of corn, firewood, lime, beans, and yucca.

loans.name: Muso

texts.ru: Этого 60-летнего фермера зовут Мусо. Мусо проживает в районе Кубадиён, климат и природа которого благоприятна для ведения сельскохозяйственной деятельности и животноводства. Мусо со своей семьей занимается земледелием - выращиванием сельскохозяйственной культуры. Сейчас он решил начать еще один бизнес, чтобы улучшить условия проживания семьи. Мусо интересуется животноводческой деятельностью, а именно куплей и продажей крупнорогатого скота. Его начальный капитал составляет 400 долларов. Мусо просит кредит, чтобы купить 4 голов молодых бычков и их корм. Он будет пасти скот на пастбище и на своем земельном участке. Сейчас он ждет поддержки, чтобы начать бизнес.
texts.en:
This 60-year-old farmer is named Muso. Muso resides in the Kubadiyon region, the climate and nature of which are favorable for running agricultural and livestock activities. Muso and his family work the land - growing agricultural crops.

Now, he has decided to start yet another business, in order to improve living conditions for his family. Muso is interested in livestock activities, and more specifically in the buying and selling of cattle. His starting capital consists of US$400. Muso is requesting a loan to buy four heads of young cattle and their feed. He will graze the cattle in the pastures and on his own plot of land. Now he is awaiting support to start his business.

loans.use: to buy four young bulls and their feed to start a business in fattening and selling cattle

loans.name: Rahima

texts.ru: Рахима более 15 лет занимается собственным бизнесом. Она трудолюбивая и успешная женщина. Рахима занимается предоставлением услуги швеи. Она опытная швея. Она была очень молодой девушкой,  когда только научилась шитью одежды и с новыми идеями шила свои первые платья. Рахима сегодня имеет большой опыт. Она предоставляет свои услуги у себя дома. Она воспитывает и обеспечивает 2 детей. Ее дети несовершеннолетние. Ее муж добрый и хороший человек, но имеет маленький доход. Рахима всегда старается для благополучия своих детей. Она планирует отремонтировать свой дом. Она сделала немного сбережения, но это не хватает для ремонта. Рахима запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки краски, шпаклевки и т.п. для ремонта дома. Она надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Rahima for more than 15 years has been engaged in her own business. She is a hardworking and successful woman. Rahima provides sewing services. She is an experienced seamstress. She was a very young girl when she only learned how to sew clothes and with new ideas sewed her first dress.

Rahima now has a lot of experience. She provides her services from her home. She is raising and supporting two children. Her children are minors. Her husband is a kind and good man, but has a small income.

Rahima is always striving for her children's well-being. She plans to make repairs on her home. She has made a small savings, but it is not enough for the repairs.

Rahima is requesting a loan of 3,000 somoni to buy paint, putty, etc. for home repairs.

loans.use: to buy paint and putty for repairing her house

loans.name: Qosimjon

texts.ru: Косимону 35 лет, он живет со своей семьей в Спитаменском районе. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Косимчон ранее занимался продажей сельхоз культур, сейчас хочет открыть собственный бизнес по откорму и продаже крупнорогатого скота. Косимчон планирует купить скот на местном рынке и откармливать в течение 30 дней, а после продать скот с наценкой на том же рынке. У Косимчона большая семья, он обеспечивает родителей жену и детей. Для него этот бизнес очень важен и для его бизнеса кредит очень нужен. Косимчон просит кредит, чтобы купить одну корову хорошей породы. Он решил не рисковать и начать с малого. По мере достижения опыта и успеха в бизнесе, он будет увеличивать поголовье скота. В данный момент он надеется на поддержку!
texts.en:
Qosimjon is 35 years old. He lives with his family in the Spitamen region. He is married and has two children. Qosimjon was previously engaged in selling crops, and now wants to open his own business in the fattening and sale of cattle. Qosimjon plans to buy cattle at the local market and to fatten them over the course of 30 days, and then to sell the cattle at a premium at the very same market.

Qosimjon has a large family; he is responsible for his wife's parents and his children. For him this business is very important and for his business a loan is very much needed.

Qosimjon is requesting a loan to buy one cow of a good breed. He decided not to take a risk and to start small. Along with gains in his level of experience and success in business, he will increase his cattle count. Currently, he is hoping for support!

loans.use: to buy and sell cattle

loans.name: Senieda

texts.es:
La señora Senieda es una madre soltera que reside en el Municipio de Condega a unos 35 Km al norte de la Cbecera departamental de Estelí, ella tiene una hija que estudia en secundaria y a quien le subre los gastos escolares.

Esta señora labora para el Ministerio de Salud desde hace aproximadamente unos 7 años en el area de limpieza manejando buenas relaciones laborales, siendo esta su principal fuente de ingreso para el sosten familiar.

Ella se presento a las oficinas de Ceprodel para solicitar por segunda vez un financiamiento para la compra de mercaderia como es ropa y cosméticos para luego revenderlos y obtener una ganacia de ello y de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos, ya que su salario no le permite realizar esta compras por cuenta propia.

ella se muestra positica de que le sera otorgado dicho credito y de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos ya que de ella depende el estudio de su hija.
texts.en: Senieda is a single mom who lives in Condega, a municipality about 35 km north of the capital city of the department of Estelí.  She has a daughter in secondary school, which is more expensive than she can afford.  Senieda has worked for the Ministry of Health for approximately seven years providing cleaning services, and she maintains good work relationships.  This is her primary income with which she supports her family.  She came to the Ceprodel office to request a loan for the second time to buy merchandise such as clothing and cosmetics to sell for a profit so she can increase her income, since her salary does not allow her to make these purchases on her own.  She is sure she will receive the loan so she can increase her income since her daughter's schooling depends on it.

loans.use: to buy clothing and cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Phuong

texts.en:
Phuong is 46 years old, married, and has two children.  She lives in Ho Chi Minh City. She and her husband earn money by raising and selling cows, which she has been doing since 1993.

Phuong is requesting a loan, which she will use to purchase a better quality foodstuff to feed her cows. She hopes this will enable her to earn a higher income from her business. She also hopes that through her loan she will be able to save money for any future difficulties facing her family.

loans.use: to purchase foodstuff to feed her cows

loans.name: Quang

texts.en: Quang is requesting another loan, which he will use to buy many kinds of artificial hair and hair care products to sell at his store. The previous loan helped him to attract more new customers and increase his income level. He hope that his business will run smoothly and will help him to improve his family's living conditions and save money for his children's education.

loans.use: to buy artificial hair and hair care products.

loans.name: Gai

texts.en:
Gai, who is 50 years old, is single and lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. 

She started a store selling kids' toys and cosmetic products 10 years ago. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of toys and cosmetic products to sell at her store and better satisfy her customers. 

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy toys and cosmetic products.

loans.name: Alexander Felipe

texts.es:
El señor Alexander se dedica a laborar como maestro  atendiendo jóvenes de varias edades en secundaria y cuya preocupación principal es la educación en estas personas ya que son el futuro de la nación y el mejoramiento de los niveles de vida. El trabajo de educación requiere de mucho sacrificio y seguimiento en la enseñanza aprendizaje.
Alexander visito  a Ceprodel porque requerir su tercer financiamiento  para la compra de  materiales de construcción tales como: zinc, plancha, bloques, cemento, zinc liso y pago de mano de obra,  Esto con el fin de iniciar el mejoramiento de su nivel de vida que tanto lo requiere para beneficio propio y familiar y de esa manera darle las condiciones que tanto anela como un buen padre de familia que quiere y piensa en lo mejor para ellos.
texts.en:
Alexander makes his living working as a teacher, helping high school youth of various ages. His primary concern is the education of these people, because they are the future of the country and the hope for improving quality of life. Working in education requires a lot of sacrifice and following up on teaching and learning.

Alexander visited Ceprodel because he needs his third loan to purchase construction materials such as: corrugated metal roofing, metal sheets, cinder blocks, cement and flat zinc sheets, and to pay for labor. He needs these things to begin improving his quality of life that he needs so much for his own benefit as well as for his family's. In this way, he would like to give them the conditions that he so much wants to as a good father who wants the best for them.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as: corrugated metal roofing, metal sheets, cinder blocks, cement and flat zinc sheets, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Khursheda

texts.en:
Khursheda is married and has three children, two of whom are adults. She always wanted to provide them with a good education and since her husband’s income is not enough to provide the family with a good quality of life, she decided to start a new sewing business. She studied the course, To Get Ahead, with a women's organization and acquired enough skills about business.  Her daughter will help her with the business. 

Khursheda is requesting a loan for 500 somoni, which she will use to buy a sewing machine for her new business. She hopes to be a very successful business woman as she is hardworking and smart.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Thanh

texts.en:
Thanh is 43 years old, married, and has three children. She lives in Ho Chi Minh City. She and her husband has been running a food stall in front of her house for 18 years. She started this business to cover her expenses and to generate income to raise her children.  

Thanh is requesting a loan, which she will use to expand her business by buying better food and rice to make good meals to sell. This will enable her to attract more customers and increase the turnover of her business. She hopes that through the loan she will be able to expand her business activities and have money to reinvest in her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase food and rice.

loans.name: Hanh

texts.en: Hanh, 40, lives in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City with her family, including her two sons and her husband. Hanh and her husband earn money through their business of selling pork and noodles. Hanh is requesting a loan to buy better quality ingredients and raw food to make better soup. She hopes her business will ensure that her family members, and especially her children, will have a better education and a better future.

loans.use: to buy raw food and ingredients.

loans.name: Thao

texts.en:
Thao would like to take a further loan to buy a greater quantity of waste materials to recycle and resell. Thao's previous loan enabled him to increase his sales and earn a higher income to support his family. 

He hopes that another loan will assist him in increasing the size of his business, attracting new customers, and increasing sales. He also hopes that through the loan he can increase his income and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more waste materials to recycle and resell.

loans.name: Cecila

texts.en:
Cecilia is 45 years old and married, with four children. 

She runs a cookery business in the Tombo Western rural area in Sierra Leone. She began her business to strive for her living

She’s been in this business since after the rebel war and sells a variety of local food and drinks within her community.  She says that the main problem to her business is the lack of capital to expand her business.

Cecilia requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to buy more bags of rice, food commodities, and drinks for resale. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her increase her business and improve her standard of living. 

In the future, she would like to open a big restaurant. She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to buy more bags of rice, food commodities, and drinks for resale.

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
Meet 35-year-old Kadiatu from Tombo Western rural area in Freetown. She is married, with three children. Two of her children are going to school. 

After the war, Kadiatu established her rubber-slipper business. She began her business because she needs to create income to support the home. 

She works at the business 10 hours per day and 7 days per week, moving around the community to establish her goods. She says that the main challenge to her business is lack of enough capital to run her business.

Kadiatu requires a loan to buy more rubber slippers for resale. She hopes the extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and improve her standard of living. 

In the future, Kadiatu plans to own a big shop. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more rubber slippers for resale.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel, esta casado y tiene tres hijos todos ellos independientes,ocupa 7 habitaciones en su casa la cual esta ubicada en la zona de Alto san Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz.

Actualmente  percibe una renta de jubilado con la cual mantiene a su familia y puede solventar sus gastos mínimos.

El crédito que requiere es para pagar un tratamiento medico, con el cual pueda sentirse mejor ya que su Seguro Médico  no cubre algunos tratamientos porque son costosos y es mejor hacerlos de manera independiente. 

El sueño de Miguel es poder vivir mejor y no adoleser ningun dolor, ya que esto pone suceptible a la familia.

Es la sexta vez que solicita crédito en IMPRO y la segunda vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Miguel is married and has three children, who are all grown-up. He has a home with seven rooms which is located in the Alto San Pedro area of the city of La Paz.

He currently receives a pension which he uses to support his family and pay his basic expenses.

He needs the loan to pay for a medical treatment to make him better, as his medical insurance doesn't cover certain expensive treatments and it's better to pay for them independently.

Miguel's dream is to live better and not suffer from any pains, because this makes his family vulnerable.

This is the sixth time he is requesting a loan from IMPRO and the second time with KIVA.

loans.use: to get independent medical treament which isn't covered by his medical insurance.

loans.name: Danelia

texts.es:
Danelia es una señora, casada, no tiene hijos, de profesión maestra de educación primaria con 15 años de experiencia como es la Docencia.
Actualmente esta señora se presento a la oficina de ceprodel para solicitar el tercer financiamiento  ya que este lo utilizaría en la construcción de la tapia de su vivienda y la compra de materiales de construcción tales como bloques, cemento, hierro, y pago de mano de obra.
Ya que  con la construcción de esta tapia tendrá mayor seguridad y tranquilidad en su  vivienda.
Le agradece a Ceprodel por el apoyo oportuno que le ha brindado, este es el tercer  financiamiento y de esa manera ha ido mejorando su vivienda.
texts.en:
Danelia is a married woman who has no children.  By profession, she is a primary school teacher with 15 years of experience, as it goes with teaching.

This woman recently went to the office of Ceprodel to apply for her third loan, because she will use this one for constructing the wall around her house and for buying construction materials such as cinder blocks, cement and iron rods, and to pay for labor.  By building this wall, she will have greater security and peace at home.  

She is grateful to Ceprodel for the opportune support that they have given her.  This is her third loan, and in this way she has been improving her housing.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as:  cinder blocks, cement and iron rods, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Cecilia Del  Socorro

texts.es:
La señora Cecilia trabaja como maestra de primaria en un colegio de la localidad con 27 años de laborar, es casada con un hijo al que le brinda toda su ayuda para su formación.
Una de las necesidades que la señora Cecilia atraviesa hoy en día es de mejorar su salud ya que ella se encuentra enferma, ya que debido a esta necesidad  tomó la decisión de visitar Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito, el cual lo utilizara para  el pago atención medica, exámenes clínicos y transporte, ya que de esta manera mejorará su estado de salud.   Y la agradece a ceprodel  ya que con este financiamiento seria el número 6 y que le han ayudado mucho cuando más lo necesita.
texts.en: Cecilia has been a local elementary school teacher for 27 years. She is married and has a son, to whom she offers all the help needed to get an education. One of Cecilia's current issues is improving her health, as she has been ill. She decided to apply to Ceprodel for a loan to pay for medical appointments and tests and transportation so that her health will improve. She is grateful to Ceprodel, as this is her 6th loan cycle and the institution has helped her when she most needed it.

loans.use: to pay for medical appointments and tests and transportation.

loans.name: Tomas De La Cruz

texts.es:
Tomas de la Cruz tiene 56 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en Nueva Arica, una zona que se caracteriza por el comercio de animales menores y cultivos de arroz, a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo costa norte del Perú.

El tiene una bodega donde ofrece todo tipo de abarrotes y verduras, su esposa le apoya en esta labor su negocio está ubicado en su domicilio, Tomas de la Cruz por las tardes se dedica a labores agrícolas y ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para comprar abarrotes para abastecer su negocio y de esta manera obtener mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Tomas de la Cruz is 56 years old. He lives with his wife in Nueva Arica, an area characterized by the business of small animals and rice growing. It is an hour from the city of Chiclayo on the coast of northern Peru.

He has a store where he offers all types of groceries and vegetables. His wife helps him with this work and his business is located at his house. In the after noon, Tomas de la Cruz does farm work. He has asked for a loan of 3,000 nuevos soles to buy grocery items to stock his business and in this way obtain more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy grocery items like sugar, rice, milk and vegetable stews to stock his business.

loans.name: Juan Wilmer

texts.es:
Juan Wilmer tiene 36 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y sus 02 hijos en el Caserío de Mamaca una zona rural del Distrito de San Felipe, su población se dedica al comercio de ganadería y agricultura su clima es caluroso a dos horas de la ciudad e Jaén, ubicado en la Región de Cajamarca en la sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica hace más de 11 años a la Carpintería cuenta con un taller propio que funciona en su propio domicilio y posee una pequeña bodega, ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de materiales para seguir implementando su taller, atendiendo así la demanda insatisfecha en su zona y generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Wilmer is 36 and lives with his wife and their two children in Caserío de Mamaca, a rural part of San Felipe District. Many people in Caserío de Mamaca are farmers or ranchers as the climate is warm and the city of Jaén, in Cajamarca Region in the northern sierra of Peru, is two hours away. 

Juan Wilmer has worked as a carpenter for over 11 years and has a workshop in his home, as well as a small grocery store. Juan Wilmer has applied for a loan of 3,000 new soles to purchase materials to continue growing his business. He hopes to meet the insatiable demand for his services in the region and earn a larger income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase materials for his carpentry workshop.

loans.name: Katya Azucena

texts.es:
Katya Azucena tiene 24 años de edad, es madre soltera vive junto a sus hijos en la zona rural del Distrito de la Matanza donde su población realiza las actividades de comercio de animales menores y agricultura, ubicado en la Región Piura en la costa norte del Perú.

Azucena trabaja haciendo limpieza en una empresa de la zona y vende animales menores en su comunidad, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para invertirlo en la compra de aves de corral y animales menores para ofrecerlo a sus clientes generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Katya Azucena, 24, is a single mother living with her children in a rural zone in La Matanza District located in Piura Region on Peru’s north coast whose population works selling small animals and in agriculture.

She works cleaning a firm in the area and also sells small animals in her community.  She’s asked for a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles to buy barnyard fowl and small animals to sell to her customers thus generating higher family income.

loans.use: to buy small animals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, pepper, vita, oil, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Segundo Ruperto

texts.es:
Ruperto tiene 43 años de edad, vive en una zona rural e Oyotun una comunidad que se dedica al comercio de animales menores y cultivo de arroz, maíz, yuca, a dos horas d ela ciudad e Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores, patos, gallinas, cuyes, su negocio está ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio, Ruperto ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para comprar alimentos balanceados, lo que le permitirá una mejor producción y al mismo tiempo ingresos mayores para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ruperto is 43 years old.  He lives in a rural area of Oyotun, a community whose main trade is in small livestock and in growing rice, corn and yucca.  It is located two hours from the city of Chiclayo, on the northern coast of Peru.

Ruperto makes his living raising and selling small livestock, such as ducks, hens and guinea pigs.  His business is located behind his house. 

Ruperto has applied for a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles to buy animal feed, which will allow him better production and at the same time, greater income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy balanced animal feed for ducks, hens and guinea pigs

loans.name: Ramiro

texts.es:
Ramiro tiene 44 años de edad, vive junto a su familia en el distrito de Cayaltí, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña y ganadería, a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su esposa se dedica a la venta y crianza de animales menores en la parte posterior de su domicilio,Ramiro trabaja como docente en el colegio de la zona y ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de una mototaxi lo que le facilitara desplazarse a su centro de trabajo, llevando a tres compañeros de trabajo como clientes que pagaran su cuota de pasaje.
texts.en:
Ramiro is 44 years old. He lives together with his family in the Cayaltí district. The people there work growing sugar cane and cattle. It is two hours from the city of Chiclayo, on the northern coast of Perú.

Ramiro and his wife work raising and selling small animals in the rear part of his home, and he also works in a high school near his home.  Ramiro has asked for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles to buy a mototaxi which will make it easy for him to commute to his work, carrying three co-workers who pay him a fare for the trip.

loans.use: Compra de una mototaxi.

loans.name: Luz Yessenia

texts.es:
Luz Yessenia tiene 37 años de edad, vive junto a su hijo y su mamá en la zona urbana de Cayaltí, a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, adicionalmente asesora a sus clientes que en su mayoría son mujeres, es muy reconocida en su comunidad por el buen servicio que brinda.

Yessenia es una mujer emprendedora, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2,200 nuevos soles para invertirlo en la compra de ropa para damas y de esta manera hacer crecer su pequeño negocio, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Luz Yessenia, 37, lives with her son and her mother in the urban zone of Cayaltí, two hours from the city of Chiclayo in the northern coast of Peru. She makes her living selling beauty products. Additionally, she advises her clients who are mainly women. She is very well known in her community for the good service that she offers.

Yessenia is an enterprising woman. She has applied for a loan of 2,200 Nuevos Soles to invest in the purchase of clothing for women. In this manner, she will make her small business grow, generating more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing to stock her business.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria, es soltera no tiene hijos pero vive con su hermana, vive en casa en alquiler la se encuentra ubicada en la zona Villa Ingenio de la ciudad de El Alto.
Ella estudio hasta el nivel primario, actualmente se dedica a la costura de shorts para dama y chaquetas en tela polar tambien para dama los mismo distribuye directamente al por mayor.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de tela en diferentes texturas y colores, ya que se aproximan las fiestas de fin de año y sus clientes le piden mayores cantidades de sus productos.
El sueño de Maria es tener un taller grande y que sus productos sean distribuidos a  nivel nacional
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en: Maria is single and has no children. She lives with her sister in a rented house in the Villa Ingenio neighborhood in the city of El Alto, and she finished elementary school. She makes women's micro-fleece shorts and jackets to sell wholesale. She needs a loan to buy different textures and colors of fabrics for the end-of-year holidays, when her clients order more merchandise. Maria dreams of having a bigger workshop and selling on a national level. This is her first loan with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy different textures and colors of fabrics to make women's shorts and jackets for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Edith Noemi

texts.es: Edith de 48 años de edad reside en condiciones muy humildes junto con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 16 años y 20 años de edad. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y es por ella que día a día trabaja muy duro para llevar el sustento diario y dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Desde hace 10 años se dedica a la venta de pupusas (comida típica, preparada a base de masa de maíz,  frijoles y queso, etc.). Con mucho esfuerzo han construido su vivienda la cual necesita algunos arreglos tales como el techo que con el tiempo se ha deteriorado. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera y así poder reparar el techo lo antes posible.
texts.en: Edith, 48, lives in modest conditions with her life partner and two children, ages 16 and 20. Family is most important to her, and she strives every day to provide for her family and offer them a better standard of living. She has been selling pupusas, a local dish made with corn, beans, cheese, and more, for 10 years. She has worked hard to build her house, which now needs some repairs such as fixing the deteriorated roof. She has applied to FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanized sheeting and wood to repair the roof of her house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting and wood to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: David

texts.es:
El socio David se sigue dedicando al negocio de crianza de cuyes,le socio los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en los diferentes ferias,el tiene un galpon donde cria los cuyes,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene 5 años en este negocio,el sueño del socio es ampliar le negocio de cuyes.El socio solicita el credito para comprar cuyes y alimentos para los cuyes.

El socio esta feliz con el credito y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: David is still raising guinea pigs to sell at various fairs. He has a pen where he raises the animals. He works from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. in his business, which he has run for five years. He dreams of expanding this business and has applied for a loan to buy guinea pigs and feed. He is happy to have funding and promises to make his payments.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and feed.

loans.name: Juliana Marleni

texts.es:
Juliana tiene 41 años de edad, es conviviente, con 02 hijos a su cargo, vive en el caserío de Culpon distrito de Nueva Arica, la cual es una zona rural.

Se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral. Su esposo se es trabajador de Empresa Agroindustrial de la zona, los ingresos que obtienen de estas actividades les permiten obtener ingresos para su unidad familiar.

Juliana se encuentra solicitando un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles, los cuales le servirán para comprar materiales de construcción que le permitan realizar mejoras en su domicilio.
texts.en:
Juliana, 41, has a spouse and two dependent children.  She lives in Culpon hamlet which is a rural zone in Nueva Arica district.

She works raising and selling yard animals.  Her husband works for an agribusiness in the area.  Income they earn from these activities is income earned for their immediate family.

Juliana’s requesting a 1500 new sol loan to purchase construction materials for home improvements.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for home improvements.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for his crop of Guayaquil bamboo

loans.name: Colletar

texts.en:
Because her previous loan enabled her to to save money from her enterprise, Colletar is requesting a new one because she believes that it will improve her business. She is requesting a loan of ksh.50,000 to purchase body lotion, hair oil, jewellery. chemicals and hair conditioners for resale

Colletar feels that she was able to make a good investment with her previous loan, which to date has allowed her to maintain her level of profits to help her family cover their personal expenses.

loans.use: to purchase body lotion, hair oil, jewellery. chemicals and hair conditioners for resale

loans.name: Adama

texts.en:
Adama is 45 years old, married, and has two children. She operates a palm oil business selling within her community in Tombo in the western rural area in Sierra Leone. She started this business to support her daily living. At present her business is doing well because out of the profit she was able to earn.

Adama is requesting a loan from BRAC Sierra Leone, which she will use to purchase more palm oil to sell. The extra income from this loan will help her increase her business and have a permanent business location. In the future, she would like to expand her business to a higher level.

loans.use: to purchase palm oil to sell

loans.name: Vinh

texts.en:
Trang is 31 years old, married,and lives in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. His wife does housework. He earns money through his business mending tires. 

Trang is requesting a loan, which he will use to buy new tires and tools to meet the demands of his customers. He hopes his business will ensure that his family will have a better future.

loans.use: to purchase new tires and tools

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
Kadiatu is 32 years old, married, and has three children who attend school. She is from Tombo in the western rural area in Freetown. After the war, Kadiatu established her clothing business. She began her business because she needs to earn income to support her home. She works at her business 10 hours a day, seven days a week. The main challenge is the lack of enough capital to run her business.

Kadiatu is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy variety of clothing to sell. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and improve her standard of living. In the future, Kadiatu plans to own a big shop.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of clothing to sell

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Guapa forma parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras, que están capacitándose para poder ir mejorando su situación de pobreza.
Maria es parte de este grupo, quien se dedica a la venta de chipa, la cual es un alimento típico paraguayo y el cual siempre es requerido, no importe si hace frío o calor. Cuenta además que ya tiene una clientela bien formada que siempre compra de ella sus chipas, y así le va cada vez mejor. Ella quiere seguir trabajando y es por eso que pide de este crédito, para la compra de más chipas y así seguir con sus ventas.
texts.en:
This group, “Kuña Guapa”, participates in the Poverty Elimination Program. They are all hardworking women who are receiving training in order to improve their condition.

Maria is one of the members. She sells “chipas”, a traditional Paraguayan snack that is highly demanded regardless of the temperature outside. She says that she has a good customer base, loyal to her chipas, which helps the business improve every day.

Maria wants to continue working and this is why she is requesting this loan. She will buy more chipas in order to continue with her business.

loans.use: to buy "chipas" [a traditional snack] to sell.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa y su esposo son productores de leche la cual vende a una de las empresas acopiadoras de leche de La Paz;  viven en la casa de sus padres en una habitaciòn, pared de adobe, piso de tierra. Tienen dos hijos, un bebe y un niño el cual esta en edad escolar,;viven en la comunidad Quenaquetara Belén del municipio de Achacachi, a dos horas y media de viaje de la ciudad de La Paz, cuenta con pocas cabezas de ganado  las cuales le proporcionan leche.

El crédito lo requiere para compra de una vaca lechera y así incrementara su producción, y sus ingresos para su familia

El sueño de Rosa es incrementar sus cabezas de ganado, aumentando la producción  de leche en su comunidad.

Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en: Rosa and her husband are milk producers, who sell to a dairy business in La Paz. They live in her parent's house in a room with a clay wall and a dirt floor. They have two children, a baby and a young son who attends school. They live in Quenaquetara Belén in the city of Achacachi, two and a half hours from La Paz. They own a few dairy cows. She needs a loan to buy a dairy cow to increase production and her family's income. Rosa dreams of increasing her herd and the community's milk production. This is her first loan with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow to increase her production, sales, and earnings.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria vive con sus padres, y comenta que su mayor sueño es poder llegar a ser una buena profesional y poder ayudar a las demás personas.
Esta estudiando la carrera de derecho, y quiere ser una buena abogada, es por eso que se esta esforzando al máximo. Es una de las mejores estudiantes.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de titulación, ya que tiene muchos gastos y quiere cubrirlos. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe, que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
María lives with her parents and comments that her greatest dream is to become a good professional that’s able to help others. She’s studying law and wants to become a good attorney which is why she’s making the maximum effort; she’s one of the best students.  

She’s asking for this loan to pay degree costs for she has several expenses she wants to cover.  She’s grateful for the opportunity she’s getting which will be of much help to her.

loans.use: to pay degree costs.

loans.name: 8 De Diciembre Group

texts.es:
El grupo 8 de Diciembre está en su tercer ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas ellas forman parte del programa de eliminación de pobreza, y están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para poder conocer la situación de cada una.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Eulogia, quien ha hecho la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, y está en un nivel medio de ingresos, seguirá trabajando por mejorar y crecer. Ella se dedica a la venta de prendas, y comenta que también es docente jubilada, y que por medio de estas ventas sigue sintiéndose útil a la sociedad.
La Sra. Solicita este crédito para la compra de prendas variadas, para que de esa forma siga trabajando, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The 8 De Diciembre group is in its third cycle of the women's committee program where they are all part of a program to eliminate poverty. They are all doing the organization's elimination of poverty survey to learn the situation of each member. 
One of the members is Eulogia who has done the elimination of poverty survey and is at an average level of income. She will continue to work to improve and grow. She sells apparel and reports that she is also a retired teacher and through these sales she continues to feel useful to society. 
She has applied for this loan to purchase various items to continue working which will help her realize her business plan and improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase various apparel for sale.

loans.name: Mujeres Activas Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mujeres Activas está en su ciclo número 15  del programa de comité de mujeres, es un grupo que ha venido trabajando arduamente y quiere seguir haciendo lo por el bien de sus familias.
Una de ellas es la Sra. Candida, una persona muy trabajadora, que con esfuerzo y sacrificio viene pasando cada ciclo del grupo. Ella se dedica a la venta de mercería, es decir tiene todo tipo de productos con lo cual da a sus clientes todo lo que piden. Ella tiene la venta de prendas, artículos para el hogar, etc. Comenta que le está yendo muy bien gracias a que tiene todo tipo de productos.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas variadas y artículos para el hogar, con lo que podrá seguir con sus ventas y ofrecer así una buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en: The Mujeres Activas (Active Women) group is in its 15th cycle with the women's communal bank programme.  The members of the group have worked extremely hard for the good of their families, and want to continue doing so.  One of the members is Candida, a very hardworking person who, through determination and sacrifice, has been involved in each of the group's loan cycles. She works selling haberdashery, that is she has all manner of goods so she can supply what her customers want.  She runs a business selling clothing, household goods, etc.  She says that her business is doing very well because she offers all kinds of goods.  She is applying for this loan to invest in the purchase of various items of clothing and household goods which will enable her to continue running her business and offer a good range of products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy various items of clothing and household goods, etc.

loans.name: Mujeres Solidarias Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Solidarias está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza para poder conocer la situación en la que cada una está y conforme a ello poder trabajar y mejorar sus ingresos y sus vidas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Teresa quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, es decir con ingresos escasos. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que se dedica a la Costura, y que por medio de su trabajo está ayudando a su familia, dándoles todo lo que necesitan. También se debe destacar el trabajo de las asesoras, quienes hacen un seguimiento permanente de capacitaciones y verificaciones que de alguna manera exigen y al mismo tiempo incentivan a las mujeres a luchar para poder superar la pobreza.
La Sra Teresa solicita de este crédito para la compra de telas, cierres para pantalones, hilos de diferentes colores lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Mujeres Solidarias is participating in a poverty elimination survey so the members will know their current individual situations. Based on that, they'll be able to work and improve their incomes and their living conditions.
One of the members is Teresa, who in the last survey was found to be in the first level of poverty, that is to say, scarce financial resources.
She reports that the work she does is sewing. Through her line of work she helps her family and provides them with everything they need. There's also the noteworthy work done by the loan officers, who provide training and checking follow-ups on a permanent basis. In one way or another, these follow-ups require and at the same time encourage the women to fight in order to overcome poverty.
Teresa requests this loan so she can purchase fabric, zippers for trousers, and thread of various colors. This will help her achieve her business plan, which will help her increase her profits.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, zippers for trousers, and thread of various colors.

loans.name: Evaristo

texts.es:
Evaristo y su esposa son productores de leche la cual vende a una de las empresas recolectoras de leche de La Paz.   Tiene dos hijos, de 2 y 4 años, viven en casa propia en la comunidad Taramaya del municipio de Achacachi, a dos horas y media de viaje de la ciudad de La Paz, cuenta con pocas cabezas de ganado  las cuales le proporcionan leche.

El crédito lo requiere para compra de una vaca lechera y así incrementara su producción, y sus ingresos para su familia

El sueño de Evaristo es incrementar sus cabezas de ganado, aumentando la producción  de leche en su comunidad.

Es la tercera  vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en: Evaristo and his wife are milk producers, who sell to a dairy business in La Paz. They have two children, ages 2 and 4, and live in their own house in Taramaya in the city of Achacachi, which is about two hours from La Paz. They have just a few cows that produce milk. He needs a loan to buy a milk cow to increase his production and his family's income. Evaristo dreams of increasing his herd and the community's milk production. This is his third loan cycle with IMPRO and his first with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a milk cow to increase his production, sales, and earnings.

loans.name: Renacer 3 Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Renacer III está en su primer ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están formando parte del programa de eliminación de pobreza, como un medio de poder ayudar a sus familias.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Maria quien está trabajando para mejorar sus ingresos y así poder seguir ayudando a su familia como lo viene haciendo. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de especias, también se debe destacar el trabajo y esfuerzo que ella hace por poder mejorar y salir adelante.
La Sra. Maria solicita de este crédito para la compra de más especias en general, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, e ir mejorando sus ingresos y así ir mejorando su vida. En la foto del grupo aparecen mas personas ya que el grupo tiene mas integrantes pero no todas deciden retirar crédito.
texts.en:
The group called Renacer III is in its first cycle of the women's committee program, where all women work and help each other to get ahead. They are part of the poverty elimination program as a way to help their families. 

One of the group members is María, who is working to improve her income to keep supporting her family. She says she sells all kind of spices and it is remarkable how hard she works to improve and get ahead. María is requesting this loan to buy more spices. This will help her to settle on her business plan, and to improve her income and her life. 

Additional members appear on the group photo as the group has some participants that decide not to request loans.

loans.use: to buy spices for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of maize, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales.

loans.name: Virgen De Las Mercedes Group

texts.es:
Este grupo llamado Virgen de las Mercedes está en su  tercer ciclo del programa de comité, donde todas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde cuatro integrantes se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, con ingresos bajos, pero que deben seguir trabajando para mejorar.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Cecilia en su encuesta mostró estar en el nivel uno, por lo que se está esforzando por mejorar. Está vendiendo lencerías y por medio de esto está mejorando su economía y la de su familia. Comenta que al principio le fue un poco difícil, pero que por medio de su esfuerzo y su arduo trabajo logra salir adelante
Pide de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de lencerías variadas, ya que de esa forma podrá surtirse y tener una mayor variedad que poder ofrecer a sus clientes. También agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar su vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called "Virgen de las Mercedes" and it is in its third loan cycle.  While taking the poverty elimination survey, four of the members have been found to be below the poverty level, with a low income, so they must continue to work to improve.

One of the members is Cecilia who is at level one on the survey, meaning she is working harder.  She sells lingerie for as living and is able to improve her family's economy this way.  She says at first it was a little difficult, but through much effort and hard work one is able to get ahead.

She is requesting a loan to buy a variety of lingerie so she can have more stock to offer customers.  She is grateful for this opportunity to improve her life and that of her family.

loans.use: To buy lingerie to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her current inventory so she has greater quantities of smoked fish to sell.

loans.name: Dionicio

texts.es: El señor Dionicio tiene 59 años de edad, su esposa falleció y vive solo, no tiene dependientes; su domicilio está ubicado en la comunidad de San Miguel de las Pampas. Sus principales actividades son la producción y venta de maíz cubano amarillo que lo realiza una vez al año sembrando en sus propios terrenos, además también percibe ingresos por trabajos de albañil. Trabaja arduamente para cubrir todos sus gastos, actualmente requiere un crédito de Bs. 10000 para comprar semilla maíz, agroquímicos y cercado de terreno agrícola, para realizar la siembra y de esta manera tener mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Señor Dionicio is 59, has no dependents, and has lived on his own since his wife passed away. His home is located in the community of San Miguel de las Pampas. 

Donicio's main occupation is growing and selling Yellow Cuban Corn, which he plants once a year on his own land. Dionicio works hard to meet all of his expenses, and also earns income working in construction. He currently needs a loan of 10,000 Bolivianos to purchase seed corn, agrochemicals, and a plot of farmland for a planting. These investments will boost Dionicio's income.

loans.use: to purchase corn seed, agrochemicals, and a plot of farmland

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma appreciates her previous loan, which improved her living standards. Her previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income.

She would like to apply for a loan of 50,000 Kenyan shillings to purchase hair extensions, hair treatment, and shampoos. She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase hair extensions, hair treatment, and shampoos.

loans.name: Esteban

texts.es: El señor Esteban de 30 de edad vive en concubinato, tiene 5 hijos dependientes, posee una instrucción de nivel primaria y vive en una comunidad lejana hacia el norte de Colomi por más de 13 años. Es agricultor y vende papa y locoto, una parte siembra en terreno propio que es herencia de sus padres de 0,5 has y la otra parte en terreno alquilado por el cual paga Bs 1600 por dos años, ahora requiere un crédito de Bs. 10200 para hacer construir una vivienda económica y de esta forma asegurar un futuro mejor para su familia.
texts.en:
Esteban, 30, lives in a common-law marriage and has five dependent children.  He has an elementary school education and has lived in a remote community in the north of Colomi for 13 years.

Esteban's a farmer and he sells potatoes and locoto peppers.  He grows part of them on his own land, half a hectare that he got from his parents; he grows the rest on a plot of land he rents for 1,600 bolivianos [BOB] for two years.

Currently Esteban needs a loan for 10,200 bolivianos to build an affordable home so he can make sure his family has a better future.

loans.use: to build a house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more sugar, flour, butter, eggs, etc. for baking shortbread to sell.

loans.name: Mabinty

texts.en:
Mabinty is 35 years old and married with two children, ages 3 years and 5 years. She runs a domestic products business in Tombo, Western rural area, in Sierra Leone. She started the business because she wants to improve the condition of her family.  

She has been in this business since after the war. She sells glasses, cups, knives and food containers within her community. She says that the main problem for her business is the improper business location.

Mabinty requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more spoons and a variety of food containers for resale. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her increase her business and take care of her family. 

In the future, she would like to open a big shop. She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more spoons and a variety of food containers for resale.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en:
Zainab is 45 years old and married with four children. She runs a domestic products business in Tombo, Western rural area, in Sierra Leone. She started the business because she wants to improve the condition of her family.  

She has been in this business since after the war. She sells glasses, cups, knives and food containers within her community.  She says that the main problem for her business is the improper business location.

Zainab requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more spoons and a variety of food containers for resale. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her increase her business and take care of her family. 

In the future, she would like to open a big shop. She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more spoons and a variety of food containers for resale.

loans.name: Abdu

texts.en:
Abdul is 36 years old and lives in the town of Nakaloke in the  region of Iganga in Uganda. He is married and has three children with two of them currently in school. For the past six years, Abdul has been working hard to manage his produce business, which sells produce to the farmers. 

To help expand his business, Abdul has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used for the expansion of the business, and will help Abdul to generate greater profits and create more profits and hence development. Abdul hopes that in the future he will be able to expand the business. 

Abdul is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP). The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Abdul who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for micro-loans.

loans.use: to expand the business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more drinking water for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase an increased amount of provisions, so she can increase her overall sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of provisions, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy increased amounts of fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her inventory, allowing her to sell greater quantities of provisions.

loans.name: Zamira

texts.ru: Замира добрая женщина. Она родилась в 1972 года. Замира более 12 лет работает в местной больнице медсестрой. Замира отлично училась в колледже. Она до сегодняшнего дня введет своё дело успешно. Местные жители довольны ее работой. Замира недавно вышла замуж. После многих лет она нашла своё счастье и теперь хочет создать комфорт и уют в своем доме. Она хочет купить мебель для своего дома, но так как она получает маленькую зарплату, она не имеет сбережения для покупки мебели. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Zamira is a good woman. She was born in 1972. For more than 12 years, Zamira has been working as a nurse in a local hospital. Zamira was an excellent student in college. She has been conducting her work successfully up to this very day. Local residents are pleased with her work.

Zamira recently got married. After many years, she has found happiness and now wants to create comfort in her home. She wants to buy furniture for her home, but since she receives a small salary she does not have savings to buy furniture.

loans.use: to buy furniture for her household

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
La socia Vilma se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de artesania,la socia vende chompas y chalinas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 5 años y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar le negocio de venta de artesania.La socia solicita le credito para comprar chompas y chalinas.

La socia esta feliz con el credito y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
This member, Vilma, continues with her business selling handicrafts. This member sells sweaters and scarves. This member works from 8 a.m. until 5 p.m. This member already has spent five years at this business and it is going very well. This member’s dream is to expand her business selling handicrafts. The member is requesting a loan to purchase sweaters and scarves.

The member is happy with the loan to buy sweaters and scarves.

loans.use: to purchase sweaters and scarves.

loans.name: Yeny

texts.es:
La socia Yeny continúa con el banco comunal “Imasumac II”, la socia sigue dedicándose al negocio de venta de CDs y ahora también DVDs, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia vende en uno de los mercados de la ciudad del Cusco, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para al compra de cds para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Yeny is still a member of the communal bank “Imasumac II” and sells CDs and also DVDs. She has run the business for some time, and it is prospering thanks to the dedication she brings to it each day. She sells at one of the markets in the city of Cusco and wants to keep working to support her family. She has applied for a loan to buy CDs for her business. She is grateful for the funding and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy CDs for her business.

loans.name: Felegensio

texts.en:
Felegensio is married, with three children, ages ranging from 4 years to 20 years. 

She operates a retail business where she sells cereals. She has been involved in this business for four years. 

She will use the KES 8,700 loan to buy a water tank to store clean water for domestic use. Her business goal is to expand business within five years.

loans.use: to buy a water tank to store clean water at home

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en:
Naomi is asking for a loan because she believes that through it she will improve her business 

The previous loan enabled her to to save money in her business. She is requesting a loan of KES 50,000 to purchase household consumables such as wheat flour, sugar, rice, maize flour for her business.

She feels that she was able to make a good investment with her previous loan, which to date has allowed her to maintain her level of profits to help her family cover their personal expenses.

loans.use: to purchase household consumables such as wheat flour, sugar, rice, maize flour for her business.

loans.name: Jenneh

texts.en:
Jenneh is 32 years old; she lives and works in Margibi County, which is the largest rubber producing plantation in Liberia. She is married; she did not go to school. She has 4 children between 3 and 15; all are living at home and in school. 

For the past nine years she been selling slippers, blouses, body cream, etc. in the local market; she started this business with a little amount from her mother, and she learned this business from her friends. She likes her business because people buy from her. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more slippers, blouses, body cream, etc. for her business. 

Her dream is to build a decent house and live a good life.

loans.use: to purchase more slippers, blouses, body cream, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Isatu

texts.en:
Isatu is 45 years old and married with three children. She runs a fish business in Tombo Western rural area in Sierra Leone. She started this business to get her daily living. 

She's been in this business since just after she got married and sells fish within her community. She says that sometimes she is faced with a scarcity of fish when the weather conditions are poor.

Isatu requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more fish for resale. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her increase her business and renovate her house. In the future, she would like to expand her business to a higher level. She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more fish for resale.

loans.name: Jacinto Eustacio

texts.es:
Jacinto es un hombre de 51 años, casado con Gladys viven en un hogar humilde y sencillo pero lleno de amor que caracteriza a las familias Santo Domingüeñas, el sector donde viven es San Cristóbal – Valle Hermoso esta es una parroquia rural de Santo Domingo perteneciente a la república del Ecuador; esta es una zona agrícola con su clima cálido húmedo además de diversos sitios turísticos. 
 Fruto del amor de Jacinto y Gladys tienen 4 hijos, dos mujeres una de 22 y 19 y dos varones de 18 y 16 años, gracias al esfuerzo y dedicación de sus padres lograron terminar la primaria y hoy en día por su determinación y ayuda de sus familiares  cursan sus estudios secundarios, ellos residen en Santo Domingo debido a sus estudios más no por esto olvidando a sus padres a los que visitan todos los fines de semana.
Jacinto y su esposa tienen el sueño de remodelar su negocio de venta de comida con el fin de atraer más clientes es por ello que solicitan este crédito, su esposa es quien se encarga de preparar los platos, ella los prepara con mucho cuidado, amor y dedicación características que han llevado a su pequeño negocio a llevarse la gratitud y los buenos comentarios de quienes lo visitan debido a la delicia y variedad de sus platos, hoy en día Jacinto y Gladys agradecen a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral y personal.
texts.en:
Jacinto, 51, is married to Gladys. They live in a modest, simple, loving home typical of families from Santo Domingo. They live in San Cristóbal-Vallehermoso, a rural parish of Santo Domingo, Ecuador. This farming area has a warm, humid climate and a variety of tourist sites. 

Jacinto and Gladys have four children: two daughters, ages 22 and 19, and two sons, ages 18 and 16. The children finished elementary school, thanks to their parents' effort and dedication. They now attend high school with their parent's support and live in Santo Domingo because school is located there, not because they have forgotten their parents, whom they visit each weekend. 

Jacinto and his wife want to remodel their food stall to attract more customers and, therefore, have applied for this loan. Jacinto's wife prepares the food with care, love, and dedication. Their customers are grateful and say the food is delicious and varied. Jacinto and Gladys thank Fundación Alternativa of Ecuador and Kiva for making their personal and business growth possible.

loans.use: to remodel his food stall.

loans.name: Isatu

texts.en:
Meet 30-year-old Isatu from Tombo Western rural area in Freetown. She is married with two children. One of her children is going to school. After she got married, Isatu established her local food business. She began her business because she needs to create income to support the home. She works at the business 10 hours per day and 7 days per week moving around the community to establish her goods. She says that the main challenge to her business is the lack of enough capital to run her business.

Isatu requires a loan in order to buy more cooking commodities to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and improve her standard of living. In the future, Isatu plans to own a big shop. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more cooking commodities to expand her business.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan, es casasdo y tiene tres hijos, dos de sus hijos asisten a la universidad y su hija menor termina este año el colegio, vive en casa propia, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Franz Tamyo de la ciudad de El Alto.
El estudio hasta el nivel tecnico superior, el trabaja como docente en una de las instituciones de educación superior de El alto. Su esposa tambien es profesora pero ella dicta clases en un colegio.
El crédito lo requiere para comprar  material de construccion (arena, cemento, estuco) ya que realizara la refaccion de su casa ademas comprar un garaje nuevo.
El sueño de Juan  es tener una casa donde pueda brindarle mayor comodidad de vida a su familia.
Es la tercera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Juan is married and has three children. Two of his children are studying at universities, and his youngest daughter will graduate from high school this year. He owns his own home, which is located in the Franz Tamayo area of the city of El Alto. 
He received a higher technical education. He teaches in one of the higher educational institutions in El Alto. His wife is also a teacher, but she teaches at a high school.
He is asking for this loan to buy construction material (sand, cement, plaster) since he will repair his home and also buy a new garage.
Juan's dream is to have a home that could provide a better standard of living for his family. This is the third time that he is applying for a loan with IMPRO and the first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, plaster, and other materials to repair his home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cassava and maize, thus increasing her current inventory levels.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her current inventory levels, hence allowing her to sell greater quantities of fabric.

loans.name: Ashurbibi

texts.ru: Ашурбиби 60 лет. Она занимается торговлей продуктов питания. Ашурбиби разведена, и троих детей росла одна. На сегодняшний день ее дети взрослые, самостоятельные и обзавелись семьями. Ашурбиби не бросает свою работу и продолжает заниматься торговым бизнесом и хочет расширить свою деятельность. Она просит кредит, чтобы закупить больше товаров, увеличить ассортимент продуктов и увеличить доход. Ашурбиби считает, что с увеличением различности товара она сможет приобрести больше постоянных клиентов и иметь больше выгоды. Она целеустремленная женщина и надеемся, что она получит финансирование, и ее бизнес будет процветать.
texts.en:
Ashurbibi is 60 years old. She is engaged is trading food products. Ashurbibi is divorced and raised three children on her own. Now, her children are grown, self-sufficient and have their own families. Ashurbibi has not put aside her work and continues her trade business and wants to expand her activities.

She is requesting a loan to buy more goods, to improve the assortment of products and to increase her income. Ashurbibi thinks that with a larger variety of goods she will be able to acquire more regular customers and to have more profits.

She is a determined woman and hopes that she will received financing and her business will flourish.

loans.use: to buy food products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her store

loans.name: Raghda

texts.en:
Raghda is a 36-year-old single lady who has been running her father's convenience store for four years ago. She is a hard worker who believes that everyone has to work hard on developing themselves through their business.

Raghda took over her father's business and since that time she is developing it in a well-managed way. She is replying to most of her customers' needs. 

Today, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, to develop her convenience store before the winter season. 

With the acquired loan, she will increase her business merchandise with special offer products, install an aluminum and glass display door necessary before the winter, in addition to placing floor tiles to the shop. These are small changes that it is important to do before the winter season.

She hopes that through the future she'll be capable of developing her business easily.

loans.use: To increase her business merchandise with special offer products, install an aluminum and glass display door and place floor tiles in the shop.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is 32 years old and lives in the town of Kalisizo in the  region of Masaka in Uganda. She is married and has two children who are both currently in school. For the past 10 years, Lydia has been working hard to manage her saloon business, which deals in hair products, styling, plaiting. 

To help expand her business, Lydia has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more shampoo, relaxers, treatments, and will help Lydia to generate greater profits and raise money for school fees. Lydia hopes that in the future she will be able to improve on their standards of living. 

Lydia is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Lydia who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to buy more shampoo, relaxers, treatments.

loans.name: Idigul

texts.ru: Идигул умелая и предприимчивая женщина в возрасте 52 лет, проживает в городке Вахдат. Она замужем и все ее дети уже взрослые и самостоятельные. Идигул по профессии швея. Она в течение 10 лет занимается шитьем. В основном Идигул шьет женские национальные платья. Так как у нее хороший опыт, к ней обращаются много женщин и девушек с заказами. Идигул довольна своей работой, ведь она помогает мужу обеспечивать семью. В данный момент она хочет расширить свою деятельность. Идигул просит кредит, чтобы купить компьютерную швейную машинку, с помощью которой процесс ее работы ускорится. И к тому же она сможет делать на платьях по желанию своих клиенток красивые вышивки, которые сейчас в моде. Естественно таким образом ее доход увеличится и она планирует провести капитальный ремонт в доме.
texts.en:
Idigul is a skilled and enterprising woman of 52, and resides in the town of Vahdat. She is married and all her children are already grown and living on their own. By profession, Idigul is a seamstress. Over the course of ten years, she has been engaged in sewing. Mainly, Idigul sews women's national dresses. Since she has a lot of experience, many women and girls approach to her with orders. Idigul is pleased with her work, since she is able to help her husband to support the family. At the moment, she wants to expand her activities.

Idigul is requesting a loan to buy a computerized sewing machine, with the help of which the process of her work will be sped up. And besides this, she will be able to make beautiful embroidery on dresses by request of her customers, which is now in vogue. Naturally in this manner her income is increasing and she plans a major overhaul of her home.

loans.use: to buy a computerized sewing machine to expand her activities

loans.name: Joubran

texts.en:
Joubran is a 52-year-old married father of three children. He has been working on repairing cars' bodies since 1993. He is his family's sole breadwinner, which forces him to put extra effort into developing his business and improving his living.

Joubran is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, to buy new equipment necessary for developing his business. He is very optimistic about this loan, and he is looking forward to keep on improving his business to make sure that he can continue to provide his children with the best education.

loans.use: To buy new equipment necessary for the development of his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her inventory.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of soft drinks, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her inventory, allowing her to sell greater quantities of fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her inventory, allowing her to sell greater quantities of fish.

loans.name: Anacleta

texts.es:
La socia   Anacleta sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “IMASUMAC II” ,La socia Anacleta continua dedicándose  a brindar el servicio de transporte de turismo para los distintos tours que solicitan sus servicios como Valle Sagrado, City Tours entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir con su negocio para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
