Hace un año atrás quedo viuda vive en casa propia; tiene una hijaque trabaja en la ciudad de  La Paz, actualmente vive sola en la comunidad Humapusa del municipio de Achacachi, a dos   horas y  media de viaje de la ciudad de La Paz, cuenta con  pocas cabezas de ganado  las cuales le proporcionan leche, para su consumo y para su venta.
Al monto del crèdito solicitado aumentará su ahorro, para comprar una vaca lechera y asi, incrementar su produccion, y sus ingresos.

El sueño de Luisa es incrementar sus cabezas de ganado, aumentando la producción  de leche en su comunidad.

Es la primera  vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Luisa is a milk producer.  She sells the milk to milk collection companies in the city of La Paz.  She was widowed one year ago.  She lives in her own house, and she has a daughter who works in the city of La Paz.  

She currently lives alone in the Humapusa community in the Achacachi municipality, which is a two and a half hour trip from the city of La Paz.  She says that she has a few head of cattle, which give her milk for her consumption and for her to sell.

The requested loan will increase her savings in order to buy a dairy cow.  This way she will increase her production and her income.

Luisa’s dream is to increase her head of cattle, increasing the milk production in her community.

This is the first time she has requested a loan from IMPRO and the first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of frozen fish and meats, thus aiding him to improve his overall sales.

loans.name: Lien's Group

texts.en:
Lien was born in 1966. She lives with her family in Dong Anh, Hanoi. She has a son who is a carpenter. She is a vegetable seller. She has done this job for two years. She earns about 3,000,000 VND per month. Her family’s total earnings are about 6,000,000 to 7,000,000 VND per month. Her challenge in life and work is lacking capital to raise chickens. Her dream is to ensure her family’s life and earn more money to buy equipment for her house. This loan is one of the steps to help her reach this dream. 

Lien is a hard working woman. She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2012. In this cycle, she would like to borrow 5,014,000 VND to sell vegetables. She always wants to develop her business and get a better life.

Other members who are part of Lien’s group include the following:

Bon is 47 years old. She has a child. She is an iron seller. She wants to borrow 5,014,000 VND to buy chickens for raising.
 
Thuan is 29 years old. She has two children. She sells vegetables to make a living. She wants to borrow 6,322,000 VND to buy more kinds of vegetables to sell.

Chuc is 53 years old. She has two children. She is a chicken raiser. She wants to borrow 5,014,000 VND to buy more chickens for raising.

Phuong is 26 years old. She has two children. She is a vegetable seller. She wants to borrow 5,886,000 VND to buy more vegetables to sell.

Thanh is 46 years old. She has two children. She is a carpenter. She wants to borrow 5,886,000 VND to buy materials for crusting.

loans.use: to sell vegetables.

loans.name: Eliana

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicándose al negocio de venta de ceviche, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, la socia vende de forma ambulatoria a todo sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos como pescado, limón entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida con el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The borrower is still working in the business of selling ceviche, and has been in this business for some time and it’s going well thanks to the effort she puts in each day to her business. She is a street vendor and sells to all her customers that look for her. She wants to continue working in this way so she can continue supporting her family.

She is asking for a loan in order to purchase supplies such as fish, lemons, and more.

She is grateful to have a loan granted and she promises to complete her payments as established.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as fish, lemons, and more.

loans.name: Dative

texts.en:
Dative is 50 years old. She is married and has six children. She sells foodstuffs and has been in the business for the past eleven years. She has successfully repaid the first loan. 

With this loan, she would like to buy more sorghum and cassava to sell. The profits from the business will be used to renovate the house.

loans.use: to buy more beans and sorghum.

loans.name: Alphonsine

texts.en: Alphonsine is 59 years old. She is married to a farmer. She has been selling foodstuffs for the past two years. With the loan, she would like to buy more beans and sorghum to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy a house.

loans.use: to buy more beans and sorghum to sell.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is 26 years old. She is married and has a three year old child. She sells goats and has been in the business of selling animals for the past two years. With the new loan, Esther would like to buy more goats for resale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in the business.

loans.use: to buy more goats to sell.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is 45 years old and she lives in an airport community. She is divorced and has no children. 

For the past five years, Alice has been selling rice, oil, charcoal, and plastic bags. She likes her business because it provides for her needs. She is requesting a loan to purchase oil, rice, charcoal and plastic bags for her business. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase oil, rice, charcoal, plastic bags for her business.

loans.name: Juan Noel

texts.es: Noel, es casado , con un hijo a su cargo al que le brinda todo su  apoyo , está ubicado en el ministerio de educación de la comunidad donde vive con su familia, desempeñándose como asesor pedagógico hace 6 años , su esposa    viajo a España para reunir más ingresos en beneficio del hogar ya que el salario aquí es bajo y no cubre las necesidades, actualmente tiene la urgencia de mejorar su vivienda   por eso visito ceprodel para ser beneficiado con financiamiento para la compra de materiales de construccion tales como hierro, bloques, zinc y elpago de mano de obra y de esta manera beneficiar y al mismo tiempo darle mejores condiciones y nivel de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Noel is married with a son in his care, to whom he provides all of his support. He has worked as a teaching advisor in the Ministry of Education of the community where his family lives for the last six years. His wife traveled to Spain to earn more in order to benefit their home, as the salary here is very low and doesn't cover their needs.

He currently needs to improve his home urgently. He therefore visited CEPRODEL to take advantage of financing for the purchase of construction materials such as iron, blocks and zinc, and to pay for labor. In this way he will benefit and also give his family better living conditions and a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as iron, blocks and zinc, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Patricia De Los Santos

texts.es:
La señora Patricia de los Santos, es comerciante  en unos de los Mercados más concurridos de la ciudad de león, empieza sus labores a las 7:00 am preparando y arreglando sus productos que ofrecerá a  su clientela y finalizándolas a las 5:00 pm de lunes a domingo en este mismo horario.

Doña Patricia inicia su puesto fijo con un capital de C$ 1,500; producto de ahorros ya que anteriormente comercializaba su producto de forma ambulante, es madre con 2 hijos de los cuales 1 está a su cargo.

El crédito que solicito la señora Patricia de los Santos a Ceprodel  fue utilizado para la compra de flores naturales para dicha comercialización en víspera del día de los difuntos lo cual le permitiría aumentar su capital de trabajo y calidad de vida de ella como de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Patricia de los Santos is a merchant in one of the busiest markets in the city of Leon. She begins work at 7:00AM preparing and arranging her products that she will offer her customers and finishes at 5:00PM, always the same hours, from Monday to Sunday. 

Patricia opened her permanent stall with the amount of 1,500 córdobas, capital from her savings which she earned previously by selling her goods as a street vendor. She is a mother with 2 children with one of them in her care.

The loan that Patricia de los Santos asked for from Ceprodel was used to buy natural flowers for sale on the eve of the Day of the Dead allowing her to increase her working capital and quality of life for her and her children.

loans.use: to buy natural flowers that are used for decorating for the Day of the Dead holiday

loans.name: Nadine

texts.en: Nadine is 26 years old. She is married and has two children, aged four and six. With the loan, Nadine would like to add more items for the business such as salt, rice and soaps to sell. With the profits from the business, she will be buying a plot of land for use in cultivation.

loans.use: to buy salt and rice.

loans.name: Felicia

texts.en:
Felicia is 25 years old and she lives in an airport community. She is a high school graduate, unmarried and has two children, 6 months old and 6 years old. Only one of her children is in school. 

For the past 3 years, Felicia has been selling used clothes. She started this business by working for her mother. She learned this trade from her friends. She is requesting a loan to purchase used clothes for her business. Her plan is to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase used clothes for her business.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna is 30 years old and she lives in Airport community. She is single, stopped her education in 7th grade and she has no children. 

For the past three years, Anna has been selling used clothes. She started this business with credit from her mother. She likes her business because of the profits that she can gain. She is requesting a loan to purchase used clothes for her business. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase used clothes for her business,

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is 35 years old, married and has three children. He also takes care of two widows ( the wives of his late brothers, who died in a fire accident last year ) by providing them with all their basic needs and paying their children’s school fees from the small income he earns from his poultry business.

Richard started this business in 2009 as a way of keeping himself busy and also to earn some money so that he can take care of his family’s needs.
He has managed the poultry business because it doesn’t involve a lot of skills. He has a dream of growing his small poultry business to a medium sized farm in his village so as to increase his productivity and income level.

Richard's major challenge is lack of sufficient capital to boost his business and, at the same time, to look after his family. This is why he is requesting a loan of three million shillings (3,000,000 UGX). His neighbours applaud Richard for being a very hardworking, determined and dedicated man with a bright future.

loans.use: to buy stock of poultry and feed.

loans.name: Milan

texts.en:
Milan is 58 years old, married and has a 27 year old son. He is working as a driver for a hospital and his wife is house-wife taking care of their home in a small village in a minority community in Kosovo. 

Based on tradition, Milan also works in an agricultural business, working on his and his neighbor's land growing wheat and corn. Milan then sells the crops he harvests in his area in order to earn a living. Now, for the first time, he is requesting a loan to buy agricultural machinery and tools for working on the land. This will allow for his work to become more effective and efficient, helping him to expand his work and to earn more income. He is hoping, in the future, to secure a better life for his family. Milan is very grateful to all Kiva lenders!

loans.use: to buy agricultural machinery and tools for working on the land.

loans.name: Tina

texts.en:
Tina is thirty nine years old, has no husband, and lives with her 7 children.
 
She has a small garden where she grows cabbages, cucumbers, and tomatoes that she sells in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 2 years. Tina needs a loan to buy vegetable seeds, rake, garden hose, wheelbarrow, and a pair of gloves.
 
She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. Tina will use the profits from her sales to pay for her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, rake, garden hose, wheelbarrow, and a pair of gloves.

loans.name: Ángela

texts.es:
La  señora Ángela,  es madre de  7 hijos de los cuales 1 está a su cargo, es vendedora de lácteos en uno de los mercados de la ciudad de león, desde hace 14 años,  ofertando  sus productos  desde las 6:00 am y finaliza hasta las 4:00 pm. 

Este crédito fue utilizado para compra de  queso duro al por mayor. 

La señora Ángela con los créditos que Ceprodel le ha brindado ha logrado a comprar productos de mayor calidad para ofertarles a sus clientes y público en general, y con esta ganancia ha logrado hacer mejora a su vivienda, ha incrementado su capital de trabajo y sueña  que su negocio siga creciendo cada día más.
texts.en:
Ángela is the mother of seven children, one of whom is in her care. She has sold dairy products in one of the markets in the city of León for the last 14 years, offering her products starting at 6:00 am and ending at 4:00 pm. 

This loan will be used to buy hard cheese wholesale.

With the loans that CEPRODEL has given her, Ángela has been able to buy products of greater quality to offer to her customers and the public in general, and with these earnings she has managed to improve her home. She has increased her working capital and dreams that her business will keep growing more and more each day.

loans.use: to buy hard cheese

loans.name: Patricia Isabel

texts.es: Patricia es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora tiene la edad de 38 años, casada, con dos hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es la venta de ropa, queso, frijoles cocidos, desde hace 6 años. Solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería como blusas, camisas de vestir, pantalones de vestir, pantalones jeans, shores,  sandalias y zapatos cerrados de todo estilo.
texts.en: Patricia is a hardworking and enterprising woman. She is 38 years old, married with two children under her care. Her business is selling clothing, cheese, and baked beans. She has been doing this for six years. She is asking for a loan in order to buy merchandise such as blouses, dress shirts, dress pants, jeans, shorts, sandals and all styles of closed shoes.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as blouses, dress shirts, dress pants, jeans, shorts, sandals and and all styles of closed shoes.

loans.name: Samalaeulu

texts.en:
Samaleaulu is a 58-year-old married woman with nine children.
She has a small plantation and grows banana trees and taro to earn a living. She has been doing this for four years. Samalaeulu has requested a loan to buy chemicals, fertilizer, a knapsack sprayer, bush-knives and a file.

She has been a member of SPBD since 2009. With her profits, Samalaeulu hopes to support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy chemcials, fertilizer, a knapsack sprayer, bushknives and a file

loans.name: Ruta

texts.en:
Ruta is a 20-year-old married woman with no children.
 
She has a vegetable garden, and grows, cabbages, cucumbers, eggplants, etc. to earn a living. She has been doing this for 2 years. The loan is to buy vegetable seeds, wheelbarrow, spade, rake, pair of gloves and a garden hose. 

She has been a member of SPBD for 2 years. Ruta will spend her profits on weekly shopping of her family.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, wheelbarrow, spade, rake, pair of gloves, and a garden hose.

loans.name: Moa

texts.en:
Moa is a 56-year-old single woman with no children.
 
She has a plantation and grows, taro, bananas, and yams to earn a living. Moa has requested a loan to buy a tarpaulin, an empty 44 gallon for water storage, a crowbar, bush-knives, and a pickaxe.

She has been a member of SPBD for 2 years. Moa will spend her profits to extend her business and improve the financial income of her family.

loans.use: to buy a tarpaulin, an empty 44 gallon for water storage, a crowbar, bush-knives, and a pickaxe.

loans.name: Lusila

texts.en: Lusila is 61 years old. She is married and has 5 children. She has a taxi business run by her own husband. Lusila needs a loan to buy new tires and seat covers, and pay for vehicle registration. Her plan for the future is to have another taxi to improve the financial income of her family. She has been a member of SPBD for 2 years.

loans.use: to buy new tires and seat covers, and pay for vehicle registration.

loans.name: Maximandro

texts.es:
Maximandro tiene 31 años de edad vive junto a su esposa en el distrito de Santo Domingo de la Capilla, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña, comercio de aguardiente y ganadería, a dos horas de la ciudad de Pucará , ubicada en la Región Cajamarca, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su familia se dedican hace 5 años a la destilación de aguardiente, para posteriormente ofrecerlo a diversos distritos de su alrededor, El nos explica que el aguardiente lo utilizan como una bebida artesana y para fines curativos, antisépticos.

Maximandro ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 500 nuevos soles para comprar caña que es la materia prima de su producto, y de esta manera tener mayor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes y así generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Maximandro is 31 years old. He lives with his wife in the district of Santo Domingo de la Capilla. The people work growing sugar cane, in liquor sales, and in livestock. It is some two hours from the city of Pucará, located in the Cajamarca Region, on the northern coast of Peru.

He has been working with his family for five years in the distillation of liquor, for later sale in various surrounding districts. He says that the liquor is used as an artisan drink and for curative purposes, and preventatives.

Maximandro has asked for a loan of 3,500 soles to buy sugar cane as it is the raw material of his product, and thus be able to have a greater production to offer his clients and generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy sugar cane, which is the raw material for the distillation of liquor.

location.town: Santo Domingo de la Capilla - Cutervo - Cajamarca

loans.name: Veronika

texts.en:
Veronika is a 47-year-old married woman with 2 children.
 
She has a big plantation, and grows taro, banana trees and vegetables to earn a living. She has been doing this for 5 years. Veronika has requested a loan to buy tarpaulin, chemicals, an empty 44-gallon for water storage, wheelbarrow, bush-knives, barbed wire, and knapsack sprayer.

She has been a member of SPBD since 2009. With her profits, Veronika hopes to improve her business and support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy tarpaulin, chemicals, an empty 44-gallon for water storage, wheelbarrow, bush-knives, barbed wire, and knapsack sprayer.

loans.name: Esteria

texts.en: Esteria is 26 years old and married with 4 children. She would like to start a small business, painting elei (traditional printed fabric) materials. In order to do this, Esteria needs a loan to buy fabric color paints, materials, elei carved board, and brushes. She hopes to use her profits to expand her business in the future. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012.

loans.use: to buy fabric color paints, materials, elei carved board, and brushes.

loans.name: Siva

texts.en:
Siva is thirty four years old and married with 2 children. She wants to start a small business making and selling BBQ in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy chicken, sausages, mutton flaps, soy sauce, garlic, onions, tomato sauce, and foam plates. 

In the future, Siva hopes to have a store in front of her own house. She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy chicken, sausages, mutton flaps, soy sauce, garlic, onions, tomato sauce, and foam plates.

loans.name: Tauva

texts.en:
Tauva is a 35-year-old married woman with 4 children. She has a vegetable garden and grows cabbages, cucumbers, eggplants, and pumpkins to earn a living.

Tauva has requested a loan to buy vegetable seeds, rake, garden hose, pair of gloves, and fertilizer. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. Tauva will spend her profits on her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, rake, garden hose, pair of gloves, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Telesia

texts.en:
Telesia is thirty six years old and married with 5 children. She would like to start a small business, which is sewing. In order to do this, Telesia needs a loan to buy an overlock sewing machine, needles, materials, and threads.

She hopes to use her profits to buy more stuff needed in her business. She has been a member of SPBD since 2010.

loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine, needles, materials, and threads.

loans.name: Unidas Para Triunfar 3 Group

texts.en:
Ramona is the coordinator of her group, Unidas para Triunfar (Unite to win) 3. This group is located in the urban slums surrounding Santiago, the second largest city in the Dominican Republic. Ramona is the mother of two children and makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner. 

Ramona is excited to be taking out her seventh loan with Esperanza and by the opportunity to grow her business. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business. She is running a hot dog cart in front of her house. She sells the food for dinner time. Ramona will use this loan to purchase sausages, bread, soda, ketchup, and other ingredients to make the food taste delicious. She will use the profits to invest in her business and to support her family’s needs. She thanks all of you for your support.

loans.use: To buy bread, ketchup, mayonnaise, sausages, etc.

loans.name: Lydivine

texts.en: Lydivine is 30 years old. She is married with three children. She sells different items but vegetables are her favorite items, which she sells in her business. She has been running this business for the past seven years. With the loan, she would like to buy more vegetables and salts for sale. The profits from this business will be used to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables and salts for sale

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is a 29-year-old married man with a child living in Masindi, Uganda. He runs a bar that sells alcohol and soft drinks; it is located on a busy street thus attracting many revelers. He also earns a salary as a civil servant to supplement his income. Inadequate capital to meet the demand pose a challenge to his business dreams while his plan is to own a modern bar that hosts executive customers in the district. Peter intends to use the loan to buy drinks to sell.

loans.use: to buy drinks to sell.

loans.name: Matu

texts.en: Matu is 20 years old and lives in airport community. She is single and has children aged 1 and 5 old years old. One child is currently in school and both of them live at home. For the past five years Matu has been selling oil, palm nut, plantain, etc. One problem she faces is the rainy season. She started selling for her mother and later for herself. She is requesting a loan to purchase oil, palm nut, plantain, etc., for her business. Her plan is to build her house.

loans.use: to purchase oil, palm nut, plantain, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Aisha

texts.en: Aisha is a 31-year-old married woman with two children living in Masindi, Uganda. For four years she has been offering tailoring services and with the proceeds she has been able to pay school fees for her children. After realizing that tailoring alone could not help her in meeting her daily needs she also ventured in charcoal sales. Price fluctuation and customers not paying on time are her major challenges while her dream is to venture into other energy sources like solar since the demand is high. Aisha intends to use the loan to buy charcoal to sell.

loans.use: to buy charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Kasfa

texts.en: Kasfa is a thirty-year-old married woman with three children living in Masindi, Uganda. She has been offering tailoring services and she has with time won the loyalty of many customers. She has also started a retail shop. Seasonality nature of her services hinder her plans since customers are many towards festive season and less in other days. A good mother that she is, she desires to educate her children up to the University, and so set up other income generating activities. Her business desire is to start a tailoring school. Kasfa intends to use the loan to buy general merchandise such as soap and sugar to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise such as soap and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Mamie

texts.en: Mamie is 40 years old and lives in an airport community. She stopped her education in the fourth grade. She is single and has three children between 2 and 19 years old. All of the children are in school and live at home. For the past 15 years Mamie been selling red oil. She started this business with a little amount that she saved. She learned this business from her aunty. She likes her business because of the ways people respond to it. Mamie is requesting a loan to purchase more red oil for her business. She hopes to earn more profit to sustain her family.

loans.use: to purchase more red oil to sell

loans.name: De Sol A Sol Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman tres socios comerciantes uno de ellos es María del Socorro tiene la edad de 47 años, acompañada, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva en un tramo del mercado local de Masaya desde hace 7 años. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de más mercadería como blusas de damas, pantalones de damas, pantalones de caballeros, camisas, trajes de niños, trajes de niñas. Rosa tiene 23 años su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y Hugo tiene 27 años su negocio es la venta de ropa ambulante en el mercado.
texts.en:
This group is composed of 3 members who are clothing merchants. One of them is Maria del Socorro who is 47 years old. She is married and her business for the last 7 years has been selling new clothing in an aisle of the local market in Masaya. The loan she requests is for purchasing more merchandise, including women's blouses and pants, men's pants and shirts, and clothing for boys and girls.

Rosa is 23 years old and her business is selling new clothing. Hugo is 27 years old and his business is selling clothing as he walks about the market.

loans.use: buy more merchandise, such as women's blouses and pants, men's pants and shirts, and boy's and girls outfits.

loans.name: Mustafe Hussein

texts.en: Mustafe Hussein is a 26-year-old single man. He finished at University of Hargeisa in 2012, faculty of Business Administration. He is employed at Sidam College as a Public Relation Officer. He needs a laptop; Kaaba will provide the laptop as a loan, and Mustafe will pay monthly repayments. When he receives the laptop, Mustafe hopes to improve his working performance and to improve his computer skills.

loans.use: To buy a laptop for work purposes

loans.name: Mabella

texts.en: Mabella is 43 years old. She is married and has one college student. She lives in Medallo, Sapang Dalaga, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Mabella is engaged in the copra buying business and earns a monthly income of 5,000 (PHP). Her husband is a farmer to sustain their daily consumption. She requested a new loan to purchase two sacks of corn fertilizers and to have additional capital for buying copra. Mabella has been a CUMI member of Paglaum MPC since 2005 and is well-satisfied with the services of Paglaum.

loans.use: to purchase two sacks of corn fertilizers and to have additional capital for buying copra.

loans.name: Oseas Neftali

texts.es:
Oseas, necesita capital para invertir en ingredientes para hacer pan, comprara azúcar, harina, sal, royal,  y levadura, si tiene su despensa bien surtida podrá trabajar sin ningún problema, generara ingresos que necesita, mejorara su producción y podrá satisfacer los pedidos de sus clientes.
El crédito anterior lo utilizó para comprar insumos para su panadería, tuvo buenos resultados en su producción, mejoro su economía sus clientes están más satisfechos y su familia está mejor alimentada, tiene mejor salud.
texts.en:
Oseas needs capital to invest in ingredients to make bread.  He will purchase sugar, flour, salt, baking powder, and yeast.  If he has a stocked pantry, he will be able to work without any problems.  He will generate the profits he needs, improve his production, and be able to satisfy his customer's orders.

He used the last loan to purchase supplies for his bakery.  He had good results with his production and improved his financial situation.  His customers are more satisfied and his family is better fed and has better health.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, flour, salt, baking powder, and yeast.

loans.name: Adolatkhon

texts.ru: Адолатхон опытная швея работает и проживает в районе Вахш. Ей 34 года. Она замужем и имеет двоих сыновей и дочь, которые учатся в школе. Адолатхон вот уже 5 лет как работает в артеле. Она принимает заказы на шитье женских национальных платьев и одновременно обучает женщин и девушек профессии швеи. Адолатхон очень любит свое дело. Благодаря ее профессии у нее много знакомых и хороший доход. Сейчас она хочет расширить свою деятельность. С такой целью она обратилась за кредитом и планирует купить новую швейную машинку, чтобы увеличить количество своих учеников.
texts.en:
Adolatkhon is an experienced seamstress who lives and works in the Vakhsh district of Tajikistan. She is 34 years old, married, and the mother of two sons and a daughter who all go to school.  She has been working in a tailor's shop for five years already.  She takes orders and sews traditional Tajik dresses.  At the same time, she also teaches women and young girls how to sew.

Adolatkhon really enjoys her work.  Thanks to her job, she knows a lot of people and she makes a good income.  She currently wants to expand her activity, and this is the reason why she has requested a loan.  She plans to buy a new sewing machine in order to increase the number of her students.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and increase the number of her students.

loans.name: Sokorn

texts.en: Sokorn is 34 years old, married and a loving mother of three children, who are going to school. She is engaged in the farming business to provide enough food for the family. Farming is the main source of income for her family. She has learned to do this business from her parents who are farmers in Kampong Cham province. Sokorn realizes that the income from farming alone will not allow her to have better living conditions, so she currently has a new business venture of selling bananas, from which she is able to earn additional income of KHR 8,000 per day. The challenge she is experiencing in her business is the lack of a vehicle to transport her bananas to sell in the markets. For this reason, she is asking for a loan of KHR 2,000,000 to buy a used motorcycle to support her business as well as to use in her household. She hopes this loan will be granted to enable her to continue working in her business and she expects to increase her household income to satisfy her living needs.

loans.use: to buy a used motorcycle to support her business as well as to use in her household.

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es:
Alba Luz es una joven de 25 años de edad, emprendedora, luchadora, soltera y madre de un hijo el cual es menor de edad y vive en casa junto a sus padres. Ella tiene un grado de educación primaria completo pero no pudo seguir estudiando ya que sus padres de escasos recursos no pudieron seguirle apoyando. Ella gracias a sus padres aprendió el trabajo de la agricultura aprendiendo a sembrar hortalizas (papa) desde hace 7 años pudiendo también reforzar sus conocimientos por medio de capacitaciones recibidas en un centro de estudio ubicado en la comunidad. Ella también se dedica a la venta de comida los días domingos buscando cada día mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y principalmente asegurar el futuro para su hijo. Sus cultivos de hortaliza están ubicados cerca de su casa de habitación por lo que le es más fácil atender sus cultivos y poder asistirlos de manera permanente. 
Alba Luz ve como único desafío el incremento en los precios de los insumos que ella utiliza para asistir sus cultivos de hortalizas por lo que hoy en día solicita financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas que ayudaran a mantener sus cultivos protegidos de plagas y al final de la temporada poder obtener una buena cosecha.
Con esta compra ella planea extender un poco más sus cultivos, ofrecer más a sus clientes y generar mayores ingresos para su familia ya que sus sueños son los de poder darle a su hijo una buena educación y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alba Luz is 25 years old.  She is enterprising, a fighter, single, and the mother of a son who is young and lives at home with her parents.  She attended a year of primary school, but she was not able to continue studying since her parents lacked resources and they were not able to continue supporting her.  Thanks to her parents, she learned to farm potatoes.  Seven years ago, she was also able to add to her knowledge with trainings received at a study center in her community.  She also works selling food on Sundays.  Everyday, she looks to improve her family's living conditions and secure a future for her son.  Her crops are located close to her home, so it is easier to care for them and attend them permanently.

Alba Luz says her only challenge is the increase in the cost of the supplies that she uses to care for her crops.  This is why she is requesting a loan to purchase farm supplies that will help her protect her crops from plagues so that at the end of the season she will be able to obtain a good harvest.  With this purchase, she plans to expand her crops, offer more to her customers, and generate more income for her family.  Her dream is to be able to give her son a good education and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies to help her potato crops.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase pants, shirts, skirts, blouses, creams, sneakers, shoes, and other items for her business.

loans.name: Manuel Cristobal

texts.es:
Manuel Cristóbal tiene 52 años de edad, vive junto a sus hijos en el distrito de San Felipe, su población se dedica al cultivo de frutales y comercio de los mismos y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica al cultivo de lima tiene aproximado de 02 ha de finca frutera que lo ofrece en los diversos mercados de la ciudad de Chiclayo, ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para comprar abono para sus cultivos y de esta manera tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes, generándole mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel Cristóbal is 52-years old. He lives with his children in the San Felipe district. The people in his town make their livings growing fruit trees and selling the produce and in ranching. The town is located two hours from Jaén in the northern mountains of Perú.

Manuel Cristóbal makes his living growing limes. He has about two hectares of fruit-bearing farm land. He sells his produce in various markets in Chiclayo. He has requested a loan of 3 000 nuevos soles (USD $1075) to purchase compost for his crop so that he can have an improved production to offer his customers. This will generate a better income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase compost for his crop of fruit trees.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta es madre soltera vive en casa alquilada con su hijo y su madre, ella se dedica a la venta de agua de coco desde hace 10 años su negocio lo tiene ubicado en la terminal de buses que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela ya que es un producto muy vendible, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de cocos por mayor y asi poder seguir con su negocio para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: This client is a single mother who lives in a rented house with her son and her mother.  She has made her living selling coconut water for the last ten years.  Her business is located in a bus terminal nearby her home.  She has a large clientele, as her product is quite sale-able.  With what she makes from her sales, she is able to meet some of her household expenses.  This client is requesting a loan in order to purchase wholesale coconuts and thereby continue with her business and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase whole-sale coconuts.

loans.name: Chanpanha

texts.en:
Chanpanha is 22 year old single man living with his parents and other siblings in Stung Treng province. Currently he is a year-three student at Norton University in Phnom Penh, majoring in Economics. Chanpanha is a hardworking student at school and is also working part-time in a small restaurant to earn money to further his education. With his little salary, he saves some for tuition fees at the beginning of the new academic year and uses some to pay for food and accommodations; however, he still needs remittance from his parents every month. 

Due to insufficient money, Chanpanha would like to borrow a loan of 500 USD to cover the costs of his education fees. Through the loan support this time, Chanpanha can afford to pay for his tuition fees and pursue a bachelor degree. He will try all his best at school and hopes that he will be a professional so he can find a well-paid job after graduation. Chanpanha expresses thanks to all people around the world who contribute their funds via the Kiva program to help poor students like him to further their educations.

loans.use: to cover the costs of his education fees.

loans.name: María Ligia

texts.es: María, a sus 56 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos. Hace algún tiempo decidió iniciar su propio negocio como una alternativa para generar ingresos que le permitieran aportar a la economía de su hogar, por ello montó una tienda de abarrotes en la que ofrece granos, mecato, gaseosas, lácteos y verduras, está ubicado en un local propio cercano a su lugar de residencia, trabaja sola todos los días de la semana y, de esta forma ha logrado suplir las necesidades básicas de su hogar. Actualmente solicita su cuarto ciclo de crédito con el que desea comprar surtido al por mayor (granos, mecato, dulcería, productos cárnicos, entre otros), así podrá tener más variedad de artículos disponibles para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, lo que le permitirá aumentar el nivel de ventas y mejorar notablemente los ingresos que percibe, especialmente en esta temporada de fin de año que se aproxima. María quiere seguir trabajando arduamente para llegar a cumplir el sueño de ampliar su negocio y ofrecer mayor variedad de productos, convertirlo en un minimercado que sea rentable y perdurable en el tiempo para que le permita continuar velando por el bienestar y la calidad de vida de las personas que ama.
texts.en:
María is 56 years old and lives with her husband and their three children.  Some time ago, she decided to open her own business as an way to generate income that would allow her to support her household.  She opened a general store that offers grains, cakes, sodas, dairy products, and vegetables.  It is located in a shop close to her home.  She works alone every day of the week, and this has allowed to her to supply her household with the basic necessities.  

She is currently requesting her fourth loan to purchase merchandise at wholesale, including grains, cakes, sweets, meat products, and others.  This will allow her to have a larger variety of items available to satisfy the needs of her customers, which will increase her sales and significantly increase the income she earns, especially as the end of the year approaches.  Maria wants to continue working hard to achieve her dream of expanding her business and offering a larger variety of products.  She wants to convert her business to a mini-market that will be profitable and long-lasting so that she can continue caring for the well-being and quality of life of the people she loves.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise at wholesale (grains, cakes, sweets, meat products, and others).

loans.name: Yeny Margarita

texts.es:
Yeny Margarita tiene 42 años de edad, vive junto a sus padres en el distrito de Cayalti, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña, arroz y ganadería en general, a dos horas de la ciudad e Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Sus padres se dedican al comercio de ganado vacuno, Ella nos explica que se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores en la parte posterior su domicilio y de esta manera contribuye con sus padres en los gastos familiares.

Ella ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 500 nuevos soles para comprar alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y a si tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes, y una segunda parte para comprar pavos, cerdos y patos para hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Yeny Margarita is 42 years old and lives with her parents in the district of Cayalti, which is two hours from the city of Chiclayo on the northern coast of Peru. The people who live in this area are known for growing sugar cane and rice and for raising livestock.

Yeny Margarita’s parents work in the cattle business, and Yeny Margarita raises and sells smaller animals, which she keeps behind her house. She says that this is how she helps her parents with the household expenses. 

Yeny Margarita is requesting this loan for 2,500 PEN to buy balanced feed to fatten her animals in order to have a better selection to offer to her customers. She will also use part of it to buy turkeys, pigs and ducks to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed, turkeys, pigs and ducks.

loans.name: Abdujabbor

texts.ru:
Абдужаббор 49-летний мастер плотник, изготавливающий национальные деревянные колыбели. В Таджикистане детская национальная колыбель - гахвора - обязательный подарок новорожденному. Говорят, для ребенка люлька - это целый мир. Даже обряды, связанные с младенцем, не будут считаться выполненными, если родители матери не подарили малышу люльку. На рынках можно встретить большое количество национальных колыбелей. К их выбору покупатели относятся с особым вниманием. Но сделать такую люльку очень непросто. Мастера учатся этому годами. 
Семья Абдужаббора - потомственные мастера колыбелей. Трудятся и стар, и млад. То есть вся семья Абдужаббора - жена, трое детей и отец помогают ему в деле. За десятилетия работы в семье Абдужаббора появились свои секреты. На изготовление одной люльки нужны два-три молодых тополя. Когда работа по дереву завершена, гахвору раскрашивают всеми цветами радуги. Колыбели, созданные Абдужаббором и го семьей идут на нарасхват. Торговцы местных рынков города Кургантюбе приходят прямо в дом Абдужаббора и оптом закупают у него колыбели.  
Абдужаббор сейчас просит кредит, чтобы увеличить производство колыбели и тем самым расширить свою деятельность. На сумму кредита он собирается приобрести лесоматериалы, краски и строгальный станок. 
В данный момент Абдужаббор занимается этим делом у себя дома, но в будущем он планирует открыть собственный цех по изготовлению колыбели.
texts.en:
Abdujabbor, age 49, is an experienced carpenter, who manufactures traditional wooden cradles.  In Tajikistan, the Gahvora, a traditional wooden bassinet, is always offered to a newborn child.  Tajik people say that a baby's cradle is his whole world.  The traditional rites surrounding the birth of a child are not even considered complete until the child is offered a Gahvora by his maternal grandparents.  Traditional cradles are readily available on Tajik markets and special attention is always given when purchasing one.  But manufacturing a cradle is not easy.  It is a skill that actually takes years to be mastered.

The manufacture of wooden bassinets is a tradition in Abdujabbor's family.  Every generation participates.  Abdujabbor's entire family: his wife, his three children as well as his father are involved in this craft.  Having created cradles for decades, the family has its own manufacturing secrets.  It takes two to three young poplars to make one wooden bassinet.  When the wood work is completed, it is then decorated with all the colors of the rainbow.  The cradles manufactured by Abdujabbor and his family sell like hot cakes.  Local market vendors from the town of Qurgan Tube come directly to Abdujabbor's house and buy large quantities of cradles.

Abdujabbor is currently requesting a loan to increase his production of cradles and thereby expand his activity.  He plans to use his loan to buy some wood, paint and a workbench.

Abdujabbor currently works from home, but in the future he would like to open his own cradle shop.

loans.use: to buy some wood, paints and a workbench.

loans.name: Muhiddin

texts.ru:
Мухиддин примерный семьянин, верный муж, заботливый отец, надежный друг и человек, который хорошо знает свою работу. Его жена домохозяйка, дети учатся в школе. Его жена и дети служат мотивацией для работы и продвижения вперед. 
    Мухиддин около 8 лет продает овощи и горох на рынке района Вахш. На данный момент в ассортимент его товаров входят лук, морковь и различные виды гороха.  Мухиддину нравится своя работа, и он намерен остаться в торговом бизнесе. Он собирается взять кредит и на сумму кредита купить больше лука,  моркови и других овощей. Он считает, что с увеличением различности товара увеличиться его доход, поэтому он смело обратился за кредитом. В будущем Мухиддин планирует открыть свою овощную лавку с богатым выбором ассортимента, ведь на данный момент он разместил и продает свои товары прямо на земле.
texts.en:
Muhiddin is an exemplary family man, a faithful husband, a caring father, and a loyal friend who knows his job inside and out.  His wife is a homemaker and his children attend school.  His wife and his children motivate him to work hard and to advance his business.  For the past 8 years, Muhiddin has been selling vegetables and peas at a market in Vakhsh.  At the moment, his merchandise includes onions, carrots and various types of peas.  Muhiddin enjoys his work and intends to stay in this business.  

He is asking for a loan to purchase more onions, carrots and other vegetables.  He asserts that by increasing the variety of his offerings he will increase his profits.  In the future, Muhiddin is planing to buy his own vegetable stand and use it to sell a rich assortment of goods.  Currently, he lays out his vegetables right on the ground.

loans.use: To purchase vegetables for resale

loans.name: Maria Mirtha

texts.es:
María Mirtha tiene 53 años de edad, vive en la zona rural de Morrropon, una comunidad que se caracteriza por sus bosques de algarrobo, comercio de granos y frutas como el mango, a dos horas de la ciudad de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de pescado en su domicilio, en la parte posterior a su vivienda cría aves de corral que los ofrece en el mercado de la zona, ha solicitado un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles para comprar alimentos balanceados y de esta manera tener un mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Maria Mirtha is 53 years old. She lives in the rural zone of Morropón, a community that is characterized by mesquite forests and production of grains and fruits such as mangoes. It is located two hours from the city of Piura, on the northern coast of Peru.

She sells fish at her home. Behind her house she raises barnyard fowl that she offers in the market in her area. She has applied for a loan of 500 PEN to buy balanced feed [for the fowl] and in this way have a better production to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for barnyard fowl

loans.name: Chantha

texts.en:
Chantha is a humble villager from Prey Chhor district, a public gathering area in Kampong Cham province. Chantha has a common-law marriage with her husband, a farmer and hardworking father of two children. Chantha works alongside her husband in the paddy fields during the rice-growing season. 

Chantha wants to provide enough for her family, so she aims to devote her time and capital to the animal-trading business. In order to enter into the animal-trading business, an initial investment is needed to purchase the animals.  Chantha is asking for a loan of 700 US dollars to add to her own capital to buy two cows to fatten and then trade for a profit.

With the help of a loan, Chantha believes she can start her new business venture and increase her household income. She thanks the lenders for their generosity and goodwill towards the poor by helping others overcome their hardships and financial limits in life.

loans.use: to buy two cows to fatten and then trade for a profit

loans.name: San

texts.en:
San, 44, is a hardworking farmer from Prey Chhor, Kampong Cham, Cambodia. He is married and blessed with five children, all of whom are married and have independent lives. San has been a farmer for almost thirty years and earns a net profit of KHR 10,000 per day.

Currently, San’s home does not have a safe latrine. He is requesting a loan of 400 US dollars to build a household latrine, which will improve sanitation and personal hygiene. He is grateful for the water loan program offered by HKL and Kiva. Because of the special interest rate, he was encouraged to focus on healthy living conditions in order to safeguard the health of his family and protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a household latrine to improve sanitation and personal hygiene

loans.name: Mom

texts.en:
Mom is originally from Kampong Thom province. She is 40 years old and married with three children, two of whom are her burden while the oldest one is employed as a paid worker. To provide enough for the family, Mom and her husband run two separate stores, one in Kampong Thom and the other one in Siem Reap province. In the stores, they sell different kinds of kitchen supplies, such as plates, bowls, pots, spoons, and forks.  Together, they are able to earn a net income of 24,000 KHR per day.

To help them further develop their current business, Mom is asking for a loan amounting to 2,000,000 KHR to buy kitchen supplies to sell in their stores. Her future plan is to enlarge her store and sell more products to satisfy her customers’ needs. She expresses thanks to all lenders for their generosities and good will towards her family to develop her business and improve their income.

loans.use: to buy kitchen supplies to sell in her stores.

loans.name: Rin

texts.en:
Rin is a hard working father living in Kampong Thom province. To earn a living, he owns and manages a farming business growing rice and cassavas on two hectares of farmland. He is 40 years old and has four school-aged children. Besides his hardships, Rin aims to educate his children so that they can earn a degree and become professionals someday. Having been in this business almost 20 years, he is able to earn profits of 23,000 KHR per day. 

Rin wants to expand his cassava plantation to ensure a high production, but due to insufficient capital, he is asking for a loan of 2,000,000 KHR to buy a plot of land to expand his farming area. Through his patience and hard work, he believes that he can increase his yields and income this coming harvest season.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land to expand his farming area.

loans.name: Maria Lucero

texts.es:
María Lucero tiene 30 años de edad, vive junto a sus hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, su población se dedica al cultivo de arroz, yuca y maíz, ganadería y comercio a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral, su negocio está ubicado en su propio domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados, animales menores pavos y cerdos para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera tener mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Maria Lucero is 30 years old. She lives with her children in the Oyotún district. Its people grow rice, yucca, and corn, raise animals, and work in commerce. It is located two hours from the city of Chiclayo, on the north coast of Peru.

She raises and sells barnyard animals. Her business is located at her own home. She has applied for a loan of 1000 PEN to buy balanced feed for small animals, turkeys, and pigs that she will offer to her customers and in this way have greater income for her family.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed to fatten barnyard animals and birds.

loans.name: Davlatbek

texts.ru: Давлатбек жизнерадостный и ответственный мужчина в возрасте 41 лет. Он женат и имеет одного ребёнка. Он живёт со своей семьёй в небольшом посёлке. Но дом, в котором они живут, маловат и не совсем  благоустроен для хорошего проживания в нём. Жена Давлатбека домохозяйка, она очень трудолюбивая и заботливая мама. Сам Давлатбек работает мастером в одной из  мастерской посёлка. В этой мастерской он работает давно и получает хорошую заработную плату. Этого дохода хватает Давлатбеку на проживание. Но у него есть мечта, он хочет построить большой дом для своей семьи. Но для этого ему необходимы денежные средства. То, что он зарабатывает не достаточно, чтобы позволить себе построение нового дома. Поэтому Давлатбек обратился в Арванд и  хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для построения дома. Он надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд  за поддержку.
texts.en:
Davlatbek is a cheerful and a responsible man of 41 years.  He is married and has a child.  He lives with his family in a small hamlet.  However, the house that he lives in is small and is not very comfortable.  Davlatbek's wife is a hardworking homemaker and a caring mother.  Himself, Davlatbek works as a repairman in the town's workshop.  He has been working in this shop for a long time and is well paid.  His income is enough to cover his family's living expenses, however, he has a dream of building a large house for his family.  

To achieve this goal he needs the necessary financial means since the amount that he currently makes is not enough to build a new home.  For this reason, Davlatbek turned to Arvand for a loan to purchase building materials required to build a new house.  He is hoping for the positive outcome and thanks Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: to purchase building materials to build a new home for his family

loans.name: Phorn

texts.en:
Phorn is 39 years old and married. He lives with his wife and two school-aged children in his own home in Prey Veng province. To put food on the table and educate his children, Phorn cultivates rice on one-and-a-half hectares of farmland. Phorn has been farming for over ten years and earns approximately $3.33 per day. Farming is the sole source of income for his family. 

Since he lives off of the electricity grid, Phorn is requesting a loan of 700 US dollars to buy a home solar system to place on his roof. The purchase will allow his household to work at night and use home electronic devices, including television and radio. He hopes he will receive the loan so he can improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a home solar system

loans.name: M H Group 3

texts.en:
Odilis is one of the members of the M.H Group 3. Group members are entrepreneurs dedicated to clothing sales, sales of natural products, shoe sales, teaching, food sales, sales of underwear, etc. in the city of Hato Mayor, one of the country’s most rural cities where the economy depends on agriculture.

This Esperanza associate is the mother of two children. She and her long-term partner have raised their children with many sacrifices and much effort. She started her business three years ago at home, with a little money that she was able to save. This is her sixth loan. Her previous loan was repaid satisfactorily and she has made some good investments. She currently operates a business selling natural juices. 

Odilis is planning to invest the money from the new loan in fruits, milk, sugar, gallon containers, disposable cups, etc. She will use her profits to save and finish building her house, which she has been building little by little. Her favorite pastime is to study the Bible. Her main challenge is to have her own home.

loans.use: To buy fruits, sugar, purified water, etc.

loans.name: Nora Lisbeth

texts.es:
Nora Lisbeth tiene 24 años de edad vive en el distrito de Buenos Aires, Morropon, su población se dedica al cultivo de frutales destacando entre ellos el mango y comercio, a dos horas de la ciudad de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella es muy conocida en la zona se dedica a la venta de comida preparada arroz con pato, gallina criolla entre otros, dulces que los distribuye en las zonas aledañas a su comunidad.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles para comprar gaseosas y bebidas refrescantes para ofrecerlo en su negocio, generando así ingresos adicionales para su familia.
texts.en:
Nora Lisbeth is 24 years old and lives in the district of Buenos Aires, Morropon, two hours from the city of Piura on the northern coast of Peru. The people there make a living by cultivating fruit trees, mango trees in particular, and by commerce.

Nora Lisbeth is very well known in the area; she makes a living by selling prepared food such as rice with duck, local free-range chicken, and sweets, which she distributes in the areas near her community. 

She has asked for a loan of 500 Peruvian nuevos soles to buy soft drinks and refreshing beverages to offer in her business, thus generating additional income for her family.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks and refreshing beverages

loans.name: Maria Purificacion

texts.es:
Doña María Purificación es una mujer de 43 años de edad luchadora y muy emprendedora, con un grado de educación primaria incompleta que junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos se han podido superar gracias a la dedicación en las diferentes actividades practicadas en el campo como el cultivo de hortalizas (papa, brócoli, coliflor) como también la fresa. Ella tiene mucha experiencia en esta actividad ya que aprendió hace muchos años a trabajar la tierra, experiencia que adquirió desde su juventud inculcada por sus padres y en la actualidad con su esposo. La propiedad que ellos trabajan es propia gracias al trabajo desempeñado por mucho tiempo y la buena administración el cual está ubicado a un kilómetro de distancia de su casa de habitación a la cual se trasladan caminando. Doña María Purificación junto a su esposo trabajan duro para que sus hijos no dejen de estudiar y tengan un mejor futuro, un mejor estilo de vida y no pasen por la situación tan difícil que ellos en su juventud pasaron. 
Actualmente ha solicitado financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para poder invertir en la siembra de papa, comprando semilla certificada, fertilizantes, abono, y poder destinar otra parte de insumos para su cultivo de fresas. 
Su sueño es poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia e hijos brindando una mejor educación, dando la oportunidad de que puedan ingresar a la universidad y se puedan graduar a nivel profesional. Sus metas comprar un pedazo de tierra para poder trabajar y cultivar más hortaliza seguir invirtiendo en los mismos y fortalecer el patrimonio para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Doña Maria Purificación is a woman of 43. She is hard-working and very entrepreneurial. She didn't complete her primary education, but together with her husband and her three children, they have been able to excel, thanks to their dedication to the various tasks they perform in the fields, such as growing vegetables (potatoes, broccoli, and cauliflower) as well as strawberries. She has a lot of experience in this work, since she learned many years ago to work the land, experience that she acquired in her youth, instilled by her parents, work that she now does with her husband. The property that they work is their own, thanks to the work they have performed for a long time and their good administration. It is located a kilometer away from their home, a distance that they walk. Doña Maria Purificación and her husband work hard so that their children don't have to leave school and so that they can have a better future and a better style of living, and don't have to go through such a difficult situation as [the parents] did in their youth.

She has now applied for a loan from the COMIXMUL cooperative to be able to invest in the planting of potatoes, buying certified seed, fertilizers, and compost, and to use another part of the supplies for her planting of strawberries.

Her dream is to be able to improve the quality of life of her family and children, offering them a better education and giving them the opportunity to enter the university and graduate at a professional level. Her goals are to buy a piece of land to be able to work and cultivate more vegetables, continue investing in it, and strengthen the patrimony of her children.

loans.use: to buy certified potato seeds and supplies to grow and tend to her plantings of vegetables and strawberries.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more lappa (fabric), cosmetics and dishes (tubs, buckets, etc.) for her business.

loans.name: Keanet

texts.en:
Keanet is 25 years old, married and has one child, who is studying in a primary school. Keanet helps her husband earn income by working in a local beauty salon, where she provides make-up services to ladies in her neighborhood. She has been in this occupation for almost two years and earns a daily wage of $8.00 per day. The challenge for her is that she doesn’t have a motorcycle for commuting to work, so she has to pay for taxi services in order to get to the workplace. Keanet would like to minimize this cost by having her own motorcycle. Due to insufficient capital, she is asking for a loan in the sum of 1,500 US dollars to buy a motorcycle to fulfill her daily needs. 

Keanet believes that she will be able to reduce the travelling costs and increase her savings for future family emergencies.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to fulfill her daily needs.

loans.name: El Milagro 1 Group

texts.en:
Lorenza is the group coordinator for El Milagro (The Miracle) 1. This group is located in the city of Hato Mayor. Her home is a compound for her two children. She is taking care of them alone since she is a single mother. The other members run different businesses selling miscellaneous products, clothes, food, etc.

This is Lorenza's 15th loan. She sells shoes, clothes and accessories from her home and by walking around her community and others. She would like to continue expanding her business by increasing her inventory to access more clients and sell more products. She will use this loan to buy many pairs of shoes, sandals, sneakers, and other types of shoes, as well as clothes and women's accessories. 

Lorenza says she enjoys doing business and her most important dream is to finish building her house, which she started by saving her profits after she started her business almost seven years ago with her first Esperanza loan. She thanks you all for your support!

loans.use: To purchase shoes, sandals, sneakers,  clothes, etc.

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru: Мухаббат  трудолюбивая, добрая женщина. Ей 53 года. Мухаббат мать героиня. Она имеет четверых  очаровательных дочерей и множество внуков. Дочки все уже замужем, живут отдельно. Сама Мухаббат живет с мужем и с одним внуком. Внука они забрали на воспитание к себе, так как у них в семье нету сына. У Мухаббат очень крепкая семья. Они всегда поддерживают друг друга.  Из давно производство сундуков является национальным ремеслом нашего народа. Украшением приданного каждой новой невесты не обходиться без наших красочно оформленных сундуков, которые завораживают взгляд своей изумительной тонкостью ручной  работы наших ремесленников. Продолжающим этого ремесла из поколения в поколение является Мухаббат и её семья. Этим они сохраняют наши национальные традиции. Добытчиком производственных материалов является сама Мухаббат. Муж Миряхё целыми днями работает на станке изготавливает основу сундука. А дальше дело дочерей и самой Мухаббат они занимаются оформлением сундука т.е покраской. Но кроме этого они недавно начали производить мебельные сундуки современного типа. Который больше подходит для современного интерьера. Но для таких сундуков материалы надо заказывать в Китайе, материалы немного дороже стоят чем обычные. Поэтому Мухаббату нужны деньги. Вот она  решила  взять деньги в кредит с МДО "Арванд". Ей нравиться услуги Арванда, Мухаббат очень довольна и выражает благодарность за поддержку!
texts.en:
Muhabbat, age 53, is a kind and hardworking woman.  She is a "mother heroine" [an honorary title which used to be awarded in the Soviet Union for bearing and raising a large family] and the mother of four wonderful daughters and many grandchildren.  All her daughters are now married and living independently.  Muhabbat and her husband live with one grandson, whom they took under their care because they had no son of their own.  Muhabbat comes from a very strong family in which members always support one another.

The Tajik people have always been involved in the production of traditional chests.  A young bride's dowry is not complete without a richly decorated chest which, thanks to the craftsmanship of local artisans, fascinates the eye with its incredibly fine details.  Muhabbat and her family come from a long line of such artisans who, generation after generation, have been perpetuating their craft, thus keeping Tajik traditions alive.  While Muhabbat gathers the materials necessary for the production of chests, her husband works at his bench all day, making basic chests.  Later on, it is Muhabbat and her daughters who decorate and paint the chests.

Recently, Muhabbat's family has also become involved in the production of contemporary chests, which tend to be a better fit for modern interiors.  However, the materials needed for the production of these chests have to be ordered from China and they happen to be more expensive than regular components.  This is the reason why Muhabbat needs money and why she has decided to take a loan with MDO Arvand.  Muhabbat really enjoys the services offered by Arvand.  She is happy and thankful for the support she is receiving!

loans.use: to purchase materials for the production of chests.

loans.name: Gs. Las Mariposas 1 Group

texts.en:
Carmen is one of the members of the Gs. Las Mariposas (Solidary Group The Butterflies) 1. This is a group composed of four women. Her group is located in the urban slums surrounding Santiago. These women are dedicated to working hard and developing their businesses to bring changes to their families and their community.

Carmen makes her home in a simple structure with her three children. She is a married mother and her children are attending school. Carmen is excited to be taking out her eighth loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loans and grown her business. She runs a Fantasia (a place where customers can find miscellaneous products) and this loan is intended for purchasing miscellaneous items like shoes, clothes, cosmetics, etc. She will use the profits to cover her home expenses and to provide her children what they need. She is planning to reinvest in the success of her business. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: To buy different products like shoes, clothes, women accessories, etc

loans.name: Senderos De Luz Group

texts.en:
The seven women in the group Senderos de Luz (Paths of Light) live in Santa Ana, a small village close to La Antigua Guatemala.  They approached Namaste because they wanted the business advice and financial education that Namaste provides.  The women in the group have a variety of businesses such as making and selling tortillas, selling clothing, a bookstore, and a metal workshop.

Blanca (first from right) has a small general shop and bookstore.  She is 36 years old, has two children in school and lives in a domestic partnership.  Her partner works as a bartender.  She has had her shop for seven years.  She had previously studied to be a secretary but had to leave before she finished her studies.  Her store is in a good location near a school and she keeps very busy helping her customers.  However, a while back she was robbed and lost some of her confidence and had trouble keeping her business going.  Now that she is working with Namaste she hopes to increase her sales and profits.  She wants to offer a larger variety of products, especially at Christmas time, and will spend her loan money buying more stock for the store, a shelf to present her products, and repairs to her photocopy machine.

When she started with Namaste she was working eight hours a day or about 224 hours a month, and her monthly sales were estimated at Q14,000 (US $1,818) with a profit of Q2,420 (US $314).  By the end of the loan cycle she is hoping for a 20% increase in sales, which would lead her to a monthly income of Q16,800 ($2,181) with a profit of Q2,904 ($377).

loans.use: to buy stock and a display shelf for her store, and to repair her photocopy machine.

loans.name: Hermelinda

texts.es:
Hermelinda tiene 51 años de edad, vive junto a sus hijos en el distrito de Pucará, su población se dedica al cultivo y comercio de frutales y transporte a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaen, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella tiene su pequeño salón de belleza donde brinda el servicio de cortes, ondulaciones, rayitos, tintes entre otros, también tiene un vitrina donde exhibe celulares, accesorios de celulares para la venta.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles, para comprar productos de belleza para ofrecerle a sus clientes que en su mayoría son mujeres, y una segunda parte para comprar recargas de saldo para teléfonos y así ofrecer un servicio adicional.
texts.en:
Hermelinda is 51 years old and she lives with her children in the Pucará district. The inhabitants in the area where she lives work mostly in farming and trading fruits, transporting them to the city of Jaen two hours away in the Peruvian northern mountain range.

She owns a small beauty salon where she provides hair cutting, perming, highlighting, coloring and other services. She also has a window where she displays cellphones and cellphone accessories for sale.

She requests a loan of 3,000 nuevos soles ($1,075) in order to purchase beauty products, so that she may offer them to her clients who are mostly women. She will also use the loan to purchase cards with prepaid cellphone minutes in order to offer an additional service.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products and cards with prepaid cellphone minutes

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is a 37-year-old married woman.  She lives with her husband, Chhaprul Mohammad, 45 years old, and four children in Maynaguri (in the village of Khagrabari) in the district of Jalpaiguri in their own pacca (brick-built) house. Her husband is a lottery ticket vendor.

Both Amina and her husband are illiterate and can only sign their names. Only two of their children go to school. One is in class VII (Grade 7) and one is in class V (Grade 5).  The other two are below the school-going age.

Amina wants to earn money by herself and she has decided to start a business selling goat meat. So, she has requested a loan from BJS.  The demand for meat is very high in her locality. It will help to generate greater profits and help her to provide necessities for her family.

She hopes that in the future, she will be able to build a pacca (brick-built) sanitary latrine.

loans.use: To purchase goats

loans.name: Dhayaja

texts.en:
Dhayaja, 33 years old, lives in the small town of Maynaguri (in the village of South Mouamari) in the district of Jalpaiguri with her family including one daughter, one son and her husband. Her husband Bablu, 40 years old, earns his livelihood by driving a cycle van.  Dhayaja is a housewife.  Both husband and wife are illiterate and can only sign their names.

One of Dhayaja's children goes to school in eighth standard (Grade 8).  They live in their own kachha house (made of mud and straw).

They need a loan so that they can buy a cycle van for their own use as well as renting it for further income. They also hope that the income will ensure that they will have a better future and especially that her children will have a better education.

Their plan is to build a pacca (brick-built) sanitary latrine in their house.

loans.use: To purchase a cycle van to use and rent for further income.

loans.name: Anjali

texts.en:
Anjali is a housewife in a small village in Maynaguri (Haspatalpara) in the district of Jalpaiguri.  Anjali and her husband Bishu both received secondary education.  They have only one son who is engaged in a computer business. Anjali's husband Bishu deals in timber.  They lives in a pacca house (concrete house)

Anjali and her husband decided to take this loan to invest in their existing timber business by purchasing raw materials for their business.  There is a high demand for timber in the locality as there are few timber shops in that area. Demand in the locality is the reason to choose this business. They are thankful to both KIVA and BJS for the loan, which will help them to enhance their existing business.

They are hoping to buy a cow with the profit they will get and start a new business of dairy products, which are in great demand in the present market.

loans.use: To purchase timber to sell

loans.name: Swapna

texts.en: Swapna, age 33 and her husband Laxman, age 42, is living in the small town of Mayanaguri in Jalpaiguri. They have two children, one of whom is studying in class VI (grade 6) and one of whom is too small to go to school. She has completed her education up to class X (grade 10) and her husband has completed his education up to class VII (grade 7). She is a homemaker and her husband is running his own furniture business. But the profit of the business is not enough to bear the household expenses. So, she decided to start a new business selling milk and dairy products in her locality. Due to the lack of money, she is unable to purchase a cow, so she applied for a loan. She hopes that this business will be profitable. She wants to bear the educational expenses of her children from the profit. She is very much thankful to BJS and Kiva for funding her loan, as she needed it very much.

loans.use: To purchase a cow for selling milk and dairy products

loans.name: Ruwa Kumari

texts.en: Ruwa Kumari is 32 years-old, married and has two children, ages 2 and 1. Many years ago, she established  her vegetable shop business. Working seven days a week and four hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid five loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent loan to buy vegetables for her business. In the future, Ruwa Kumari plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for her business

loans.name: El Chance Group

texts.es: Grupo conformado por tres socias trabajadoras una de ellas es Sonia tiene la edad de 23 años, acompañada, con dos hijos, su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de Zelsa y ropa nueva, distribuye sus productos en su comunidad y alrededores desde hace 2 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de cosméticos como perfumes, lociones, cremas faciales, cremas corporales, shampoo y ropa como pantalones, camisas, camisitas para niños, blúmeres, etc. Jazmina mujer de 45 años su negocio es la venta de refrescos naturales, helados, hielo y Francisca tiene 50 años su negocio es la venta de pozol, semilla de jícaro, tiste.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three hardworking members, one of whom is Sonia. She is 23 years old and in a relationship, with two children. Her business is selling Zelsa makeup and new clothing. She has sold her products in her community and the surrounding area for 2 years.

She is requesting the loan for the purchase of cosmetics like perfume, lotion, facial cream, body cream, shampoo; and clothing like pants, shirts, children's shirts, underpants, etc.

Jazmina is a 45 year old woman; her business is selling natural soft drinks, ice cream, and ice. Francisca is 50 years old; her business is selling pozol (a drink of cooked cornmeal), semilla de jícaro (a drink of ground jicaro seeds), and tiste (a drink of cacao beans and corn).

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics like perfume, lotion, facial cream, body cream, shampoo; and clothing like pants, shirts, children's shirts, underpants, etc.

loans.name: Victoriana Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo forman cuatro mujeres emprendedoras de negocio una de ellas es Pilar mujer  de 43 años de edad, acompañada, con tres hijos, su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de Avon y Arabela desde hace 4 años, los productos los distribuye en su comunidad. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de perfumes de damas, perfumes de varón, cremas, lociones, pinturas de uñas, labiales, rubor, maquillaje, etc. Darling mujer de 27 años su negocio es la venta de cosméticos por catálogo de Avon y Zelsa, Aura mujer de 34 años su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y Anelia tiene la edad de 32 años su negocio es la venta de comida y gaseosa
texts.en:
This group is made up of four enterprising women. One of them is Pilar, a 43 year old woman who has a partner and three children. For the past four years her business has been the sale of Avon and Arabela cosmetics. She distributes the products in her community. She requests the loan in order to purchase lady's perfume, men's perfume, creams lotions, nail polish, lipstick, blush, make up, etc.

Darling is a 27 year old woman and her business is the sale of Avon and Zelsa cosmetics by catalog. Aura is a 34 year old woman and her business is the sale of new clothing. Finally, Anelia is 32 years old and her business is the sale of food and soda.

loans.use: to purchase lady's perfume, men's perfume, creams, lotions, nail polish, lipstick, blush, make up, etc.

loans.name: G.s Buenas Nuevas Group

texts.es:
La señora Domitila es una persona emprendedora y querida en su comunidad, se dedica al comercio y su fuente principal de ingresos es la venta de abarrotería en general desde hace  15 años su negocio se encuentra en su casa de habitación y sus principales clientes son vecinos de su comunidad y empleados de la empresa melonera.
Doña Domitila su negocio cuenta con  poco producto porque la temporada de siembra de melón no ha empezado y sus ventas bajan un poco, pero como la temporada inicia esta época solicita el crédito nuevamente ya que el anterior le fue de mucha ayuda.
